homepage_content: Bayview Motel - Waterfront Motel Accommodation in Paihia Welcome to Paradise Waterfront Motel and Apartments in Paihia Book Now Waterfront Location 0 Minute walk from Paihia 0 Rooms WiFi Fibre Internet The Bayview Motel offers unobstructed views over Paihia Beach and the beautiful Bay of Islands. Situated on Paihia's central waterfront, your accommodation is only a 1-minute flat walk to the wharf, shops, cafés and amenities. Sit out on your private deck and take advantage of the spectacular views from our waterfront suites. At the Bayview Motel you have all your holiday needs at your doorstep, with the added advantage of a fantastic waterfront location at reasonable prices. The many exciting activities offered in the Bay of Islands are easily accessible from your accommodation. Try cruising on the bay, swimming with dolphins or sailing in a tall ship. Or get your adrenalin flowing with fast boat trips to the Hole in the Rock, parasailing or a visit to the nearby Adventure Park. The Waitangi Treaty Grounds, historic Russell or bus tours to Cape Reinga and Ninety Mile Beach are all great day trips. The motel accommodation at the Bayview Motel consists of 11 self-contained waterfront apartments and family units (sleeping 2-7). All rooms are serviced daily and have full kitchens, WiFi, Sky TV and queen-size beds. Book Online Make a Booking

homepage_content: City Health & Fitness Training – Kettlebell Workouts & Online Coaching Skip to content The “Mace Descent” is a 20-minute workout training with an adjustable mace . Perform six exercises and aim to complete all of the reps within the time limit or beat previous scores if unfinished. The exercises include 100 reps of 10 and 2s, 80 reps of Trailblazers, 60 reps of Switch 360s, 40 reps of Switch Squats, 20 reps of 360 Rotational Uppercuts, and 10 reps of Bondi Swings. Rest as needed and resume the workout promptly, maintaining good technique throughout. Exercises 10 and 2s: Cast mace over shoulder, finish at 2:00, keep elbows tucked. Trailblazers: Switch hands side to side, focus on core engagement. Switch 360s: Perform 360, switch sides, keep elbows tucked. Switch Squats: Cast mace, slide hands, perform squat, keep control. 360 Rotational Uppercuts: 360, pivot foot, uppercut, switch sides. Bondi Swings: Single arm 360, paddle row, squat, switch hands. If you would like to learn more about Maverick Torque , check out: Dangerously Fit Indian Clubs . The steel clubbell, folks, it’s amazing, really tremendous. Let me tell you, it’s a fitness tool that goes way back, all the way to the Stone Age. Can you believe it? And now, it’s making a big comeback. Huge! This clubbell, this steel clubbell, it’s a game-changer for physical training, believe me. Unlike those useless fitness accessories out there, this steel clubbell has real benefits, tremendous benefits. It can revolutionize the way people train, believe me. You’ve got this weighted globe, welded onto a long lever. And here’s the thing, the weight distribution is uneven, so it’s a real challenge. It’s one of the oldest fitness tools, but it’s not widely used yet in gyms. We need to change that, folks. Building strong shoulders with clubs has never been easier, trust me! The benefits are tremendous, let me tell you. It’s great for shoulder resilience, grip strength, core strength, power, and those stabilizer muscles. It’s a total body workout, it teaches your body to work as a single unit. It strengthens the bond between joints and muscles, believe me. You won’t find anything like it. Now, because of the design, the weight feels heavier than those perfectly balanced dumbbells. But don’t worry, start with lighter weights and work your way up. You’ll see progress, folks. It’s all about progress. If you want to learn how to use this steel clubbell properly, you gotta consult the experts. There are great sources out there, like Dangerously Fit. They’ve got the training information, the videos, the articles. They know what they’re doing. Trust me, you’ll be in good hands. In ancient times, folks, let me tell you, men faced each other on the battlefield. They had swords, battleaxes, war-hammers, and heavy maces, deadly weapons, believe me. But here’s the thing, folks, those weapons did more than just cause destruction. They gave the wielder incredible core strength and shoulder mobility. And let me tell you, that’s what we’re after in our modern world. We’re not just talking about smashing heads like squashed cantaloupes, no, no, we want that core strength and mobility. Credit: https://www.etsy.com/listing/1446078689/adjustable-mace-bell-bamboo-loadable And that’s where the clubbell comes in, folks, it’s something special. It’s better than swords or war hammers, let me tell you why. You can adjust the weight quickly and easily, it’s fantastic. And I have to mention the Maverick Club, it’s a brand new, fully adjustable tool for warming up and clubbell-specific training. It’s tremendous! Now, let’s talk about who benefits from clubbell training. We’re not just saying everybody, although it’s great for everybody, folks. We’re talking about specific groups here. We’re talking about rotational sports like hockey, golf, tennis, lacrosse, baseball, and softball. Those sports where you swing something, you know what I mean? Now, in these sports, there are muscular imbalances, unavoidable really. But let me tell you, those imbalances can affect your performance and lead to injuries, and we don’t want that. Clubbell training, my friends, it helps minimize those imbalances, keeps you healthy, and boosts your performance in your sport. It’s a game-changer, believe me. When it comes to warmups and preparation, clubbell training fits right into your strength training warmup. It’s fantastic, folks. You get a wide range of movements that bring so many benefits. But remember, safety and effectiveness are key. So, you might be asking yourself… “where do I find such training tools”? The answer is simple, go to Google and search “ clubbells on Amazon “…. and you’ll find hundreds! A Turkish wrestling team nearly 100 years ago set out to invent a functional training total-body kettlebell movement that would prime young athletes for competition – an exercise that builds stamina and flexibility, improves stability and strength. For over a hundred years, Turkish wrestlers have sought to create an exercise that will prime young athletes for competition. This total-body movement builds stamina and flexibility while improving stability and strength in all parts of the body – it’s perfect preparation! The kettlebell Turkish get-up was born. It’s a wrestler’s best friend and the key to unlocking an endless amount of possibilities in any sport that requires you be on your feet for long periods, like Muay Thai or wrestling! The first thing one must do when executing this technique is lie flat with arms extended overhead, so they form two lines pointing towards ceiling while remaining as close together at shoulders without allowing them touch. Because if done incorrectly then there will not only feel pain but may also end up getting hurt even worse than before since it could lead into serious back injuries down the line which nobody wants right? For those looking to get up off the ground, there is an exercise that will help. As kettlebell legend goes it was created by Pavel Tsatsouline who introduced kettlebell training into America and with just one single movement can be used for everything from weight loss or gaining muscle mass in your legs all while improving balance! He sat back, crossed his arms and said “It’s all in the wrists. You can get up anytime you want.” The man looked to be around 50 years old but there was no mistaking that face – it’s Pavel Tsatsouline! “As legend goes,” says this famous American kettlebell coach with a wealth-of knowledge on how best conduct oneself when fighting against gravity or not: “A guy walks into my gym who couldn’t complete one military press without dropping them both times; he did 20 rep squat Chicano style before finally asking me if I had any advice for him.” It’s a good thing kettlebell Turkish get-ups haven’t been around for very long. If they had, the smartest people in fitness might have forgotten all about them by now I can only imagine what would happen if we were to embrace an exercise regimen that spans centuries and is still somehow as effective today! The kettlebell get-up is an exercise that targets muscles in the body not usually developed through traditional strength training. It can help you achieve your fitness goals and build immunity to injury! Performing get-ups regularly will make you more powerful. The move is great for targeting muscles that traditional strength exercises leave out, and it can be done anywhere with just your body weight! I suggest you perform this movement with a powder coated kettlebell to give you better grip on the kettlebell. Get ups are the most intimidating obstacle course in bar space. It takes a certain level of courage, patience and skill to complete just one! But don’t worry — as with any new skills there’s always practice that makes you better at balancing an unwieldy metal orb above your head while going through seven steps (not including getting up). If you have ever thought about adding some variety to your workout, then power bags are an excellent way for those who want something more than just weights. Sand is also great because it’s easy on the joints so even people without much experience can do them! The many uses for power bags are limited only by your imagination. They can be used as a rebound in shooting ranges, or filled with water and kicked around on the beach to build up some tension before competition time begins! A great way make any home gym more fun? Try out this new addition—power bag have been proven effective across different types of athletes from Olympic lifters right down casual backyard warriors like you an me. Power bags are a cool way to work on your grip and core while also getting some arm strength. Sand-filled canvas bags fill with sand that you can throw, pack down or pancake pounds out of them! You can do all sorts drills – even Russian Twist Pushups if need be in order get those arms moving. So what’s the catch? No catches here friends — these things just plain old work. It’s time to shake up your abdominal workout routine. Why not try power bags? They’re a fun piece of equipment that will complement any home gym—and many forward-thinking gyms have them available as well! When you think of workout gear, do they not make the perfect accessory? power bags seem to be coming back in a big way. This time around there’s no need for black nor green because instead we have pink sandboxes that are shiny and new! Power bags seem to have a strong comeback into the fitness world. I say it’s because they are actually not anything new—just coming back in a slightly different look (hello, pink shiny power bag!). When I was in high school, we used to use power bags a lot. Our coach had this great idea of cutting inner tube halves and filling them with sand so they would be tough enough for any exercise you could think of! You should try it too if that sounds like something your workout needs, the best part is how simple these things can really get made from just an old spare tire around here (I’m never without one). The power bag is a versatile tool that can be used for many things, including weight training and rehabilitation. Here are some awesome reasons why you should workout with one: * You get intense cardio workouts because of how much work your heart has to do when lifting them * They offer an amazing full body resistance exercise without having find multiple items like free weights or discs; it’s just thrown over either shoulder! This means no wasted movement while doing other exercises in order target specific areas on particular days. Full body multi-joint exercises are a great way to give your muscles all the benefits of heavy weights without sacrificing form. With these kinds of moves, you can do more work in less time and get faster results! Power bags in Australia can be found online, make sure you choose a company that has many satisfied customers. The best part about this workout is that you can take it with me anywhere. I wear the duffel bag on my shoulder as if it were a purse, and then when we get to our destination all of my worries are gone because there’s no more need for backpacks or purses! With its small size, the self-focused design is perfect for those who want some quality outdoor time. You can take it with you on your morning walk or even use this machine outside at a park! You’ll never be happier than when you take your new workout buddy outside for some fresh air and exercise. It can go with you anywhere, so it doesn’t matter if there are no facilities nearby! You can use additional weight in your sandbag workouts . I love bodyweight exercises, but sometimes it’s nice to lift some heavier stuff! 80 pounds is a good starting point for me and the weights are adjustable–you just take one filler bag out if you want less resistance or put them back when desired level has been reached. Wherever you are and whatever lifestyle you are following, it is important to know how to keep your kids fit and healthy. Topping the list of tips for staying fit and healthy, are exercise and healthy eating. If you observe these two tips with commitment, the chances of your straying from good health are minimal. And if you need to lose weight for good, you probably want to start with a body transformation program. Exercise Whenever you have free time, you should find a good place where you can run. Whether in a park or a running trail , running is a great way to keep your kids fit. If you find running is a bit too energetic for you, you can walk at least one hour a day will help you to burn around 200 calories. Any children’s personal trainer will advise you that besides other exercise routines you may be involved in, running or walking are great ways to help stay in shape. Swinging the steel mace is also great, it will build your child’s grip strength and shoulder strength like nothing else. I tell all my clients to buy through Dangerously Fit Macebells NZ , the tend to have the best steel maces. Workouts Workouts are also a good way to keep kids fit, especially if the type of job you have is more sedentary . You can fix regular work out schedules at home, or better still, join a gym. Routine workouts will help the body to stay fit, and if you find this difficult to stick to, you could use a kids personal trainer to keep you on track. At times you may find it difficult to exercise on your own. It could become boring and repetitious. So you could also hire a personal trainer that knows how to train with the steel mace, or instead join some club or team where you will have company to work out with. In this way you might also gain new friends socially. If want to learn more about how to train with the steel mace, check out http://www.steelmace.co.nz/steel-clubbell/. Do your own cooking This is the first thing your kids personal trainer will recommend if you are doing a 12 week challenge. So far we have been concentrating more on the side of staying healthy. But healthy is as important. Keeping healthy also means eating healthy. If you have to eat in a group (with family, colleagues, in a restaurant, etc.) you could end up eating food that is rich. Eaten on a daily basis, this type of rich food will definitely add to your kilos and bring on all kinds of health problems. So if it is possible you should try and do your own cooking. You can then concentrate on health foods that the body needs not necessarily what the body wants! Using less oil, going in for more fresh foods, fruits and vegetables and lean meats, all these will help you to not only keep your weight down, but also keep you in better shape. If you are not too sure of the types of food you should eat especially when exercising, check with an experienced personal trainer. Avoid smoking One very important and destructive habit you can kick to stay healthy and fit, is smoking . If you find it difficult to kick this habit on your own, ask for help. There are many professionally-run institutions which will help you to quit smoking. Drink water It is important to keep the body hydrated at all times. So drink plenty of water. If you have alcohol, ensure that you drink in moderation. At any time if you feel you are approaching addictional level you can always discuss ways and means to control such a situation with a personal trainer. Such professionals have the experience and training to help people to stay fit and healthy. You may be a great fitness instructor but having the relevant fitness instructor certification will help you get ahead in your career. The practical experience will you better understand the requirements of being a thorough professional in this trade. But a few years into it, you should definitely pursue your certifications to improve your job prospects. If you have been considering taking your fitness instructor exams or are about to take it sometime soon, some tips may help you crack it with flying colours. Here’s what you can keep in mind, Practice Tests Get hold of as many practice tests as you can. Ask other fitness instructors who have fitness instructor certifications in your place of work for additional reference material or old practice tests that can help. Practice tests will help you to understand the test format and the kind of questions instructors are tested with. You can accordingly spend a few weeks practicing these answers before the final test. Knowing your test format and the kind of questions that will come will help you to finish the test faster and gain confidence too. Practical Help If you have other instructors in your place of work with relevant fitness instructor certifications from nz.ptcertifications.com – personal training courses you can always ask them for practical help. Ask them how they prepared and what they did to pass the exams. Guidance from professionals will always help you get ahead faster. Take Model Tests Before you give the exams, try to take mock tests . Time yourself and see what topics you aren’t being able to crack well. If you know your weak points before giving the exam, you will have adequate time to prepare yourself and crack the final exam. Study Efficiently Efficient studying involves studying your text books and teaming it with practical experience. Keep asking questions when you study. Do not just refer to one resource to get your facts right. Keep researching on other mediums online and other platforms to ensure you are well prepared by the end of it all. A little at a time A common mistake many people make when giving exams is cramming up at the last moment. And this affects their ability to take the exams well. It is important to prepare over a period of time and a little at a time. This will help you retain what you have learnt for longer. Understand the Question When taking mock exams, read and understand the questions well and prepare your answers in your head before writing them down. Sometimes, people do not understand the question or don’t read it carefully enough. They end up writing unnecessary features in the answers or marking the wrong answer in a multiple-choice format as a result. Be patient When practicing for your exams or when giving the exam, be patient. Do not rush through your exam or study. This will help you succeed better in the exams. You must understand and realize the potential benefits of hiring a personal trainer as that will help you justify the financial investment involved. The greatest advantage of working with a qualified and fully-certified personal trainers in San Diego is that it is the easiest, fastest and the most effective way to enhance your fitness levels and improve your health. The benefits of personal training has been established and acknowledged as such, it has extended well beyond the realm of the elites, the famous and the super rich. It is time you made lifestyle changes with San Diego Workout. Achieve Your Goals Personal trainers help you to define precisely your fitness goals . A fitness trainer would assess your fitness level and discuss with you what you actually desire to attain through your fitness regimen. You may have ideas about the fitness objectives and goals who wish to attain. However, fitness pro would be able to set smaller, specific and more realistic objectives for you. He would be vigilant and would constantly track your progress. Customized Workout Personal trainers assess your fitness levels and fitness goals thoroughly and create a personalized workout /fitness plan for you. The specific workout plan is tailored to your unique requirements. This customized plan generates effective results as compared to a general or a standard workout plan. A qualified fitness professional is able to evaluate your physical condition and has an idea of your clinical background. He is therefore, able to chalk out a program that is best-suited to your individual needs. Encouragement and Motivation What we usually lack most is the encouragement and the motivation to hit the gym and that is what personal trainers are supposed to be doing for you. Proper Instruction A professional trainer devotes his time and attention to teaching you proper way to carry out all the exercises that are included in your fitness regimen. homepage_content: The Vineyards And Wineries Of New Zealand's Kumeu District - Carriagescafe.co.nz The Vineyards And Wineries Of New Zealand's Kumeu District Carriagescafe.co.nz is no longer available here. Please visit cafecarriages.co.nz instead. Visiting Kumeu: Auckland’s Premiere Winemaking District For visitors to New Zealand’s affluent Kumeu district, there’s no shortage of things to both do and see. On this website, readers can discover the many attractions to be found in Kumeu, a quaint rural winemaking community located roughly 25 kilometres northwest of the city of Auckland. Vineyards and Wineries The residents of Kumeu are descended from settlers who originally migrated from Croatia’s Dalmatian Coast in the mid-19th century. They brought the art of winemaking with them from the old country. For this reason, Kumeu now enjoys a reputation for its excellent vineyards and top-notch wines. In fact, winemaking represents the primary industry in Kumeu and in the nearby settlements of Waimauku and Huapai as well. Several local wine labels are recognised internationally for their excellent Chardonnays, including Cooper’s Creek, Kumeu River and Solijans Estate Winery. Visitors to Kumeu can stop by and enjoy the district’s impressive range of boutique wineries, along with its many highly-rated cafes and restaurants. Other Activities Kumeu has much more to offer than just vineyards and wineries. For example, vacationers can also visit the Riverhead, New Zealand’s oldest riverside tavern (located just a short ferry ride away). They can also drop in at the nearby Hallertau Restaurant and enjoy a wide range of freshly-brewed craft beers. Anyone planning a trip to Kumeu should thoroughly familiarise themselves with this site, where they can read about all the district’s most popular attractions, along with its best-rated hotels and B&Bs.

homepage_content: Arrowtown Holiday Park | Queenstown Camping | Hampshire All Parks You are viewing Arrowtown – A Hampshire Holidays Park Formerly Known as Arrowtown Holiday Park Welcome to Arrowtown Steeped in history and charm, Arrowtown is a must-see. Hampshire Holiday Parks – Arrowtown offers the perfect location to explore this unique goldmining town. Welcome to Arrowtown Steeped in history and charm, Arrowtown is a must-see. Hampshire Holiday Parks – Arrowtown offers the perfect location to explore this unique goldmining town. Previous Next Location Arrowtown is an old gold mining town near Queenstown which was built on the banks of the Arrow River in 1862. The town is renowned for its stunning autumn colours and rich history. Our Arrowtown Holiday Park is a great base so you can explore this unique town and the surrounding area. Hampshire Holiday Parks - Arrowtown is just a few minutes’ walk from the town centre with its beautiful, restored buildings, specialty restaurants and unique shops. Arrowtown centre – 600m Chinese settlement – 1km Arrowtown Golf Club – 2km Queenstown – 20 minutes Coronet Peak Ski Resort – 20 minutes Wanaka – 50 minutes Arrowtown Accommodation Our Arrowtown Holiday Park has a variety of accommodations that will suit all budgets – from our fully self contained tourist flats, ensuite studios, lodge rooms, to powered sites, tent sites and electric vehicle sites. View Accommodation Options Offers Stay 2, Save 25% Save 25% when you book a 2–7 night stay at selected Hampshire Holiday Parks, for travel between now and the end of November. Learn More Book Now Features & Facilities BBQ facilities Kitchen facilities Laundry facilities Tennis Court Playground Free parking WiFi EV Charging Stations Park Map Check pricing & availability Arrowtown Attractions Hiking Trails One of the best hikes in Arrowtown is Big Hill, known for its breathtaking views. The Sawpit Gully Track is a beautiful short loop that leads up German Hill. Golf Courses Arrowtown is a golf lover’s paradise, with three iconic golf courses including the Millbrook Resort, a 36-hole championship course. Biking Arrowtown is surrounded by beautiful cycling tracks, including the renowned Queenstown Trail and the Arrowtown River Trail, a fantastic loop track. Wineries Central Otago is regarded as one of New Zealand's premier wine regions. Join a guided wine tour or cycle along the Arrow River to the Gibbston Valley wineries. Lakes District Museum & Art Gallery The local museum provides insight into the early history of the Whakatipu region, while the gallery features work from talented local artists. Arrowtown Chinese Settlement The Chinese Settlement is a heritage-listed historic village, founded by Chinese people during the Otago Gold Rush of the 1860s. It's now a popular tourist attraction. Testimonials “Great place to stay! We stay in the cabins and they are always super clean and quite spacious. It’s a nice quiet area and a good place to relax. The staff are really friendly as well.” Xavier Hampshire Holiday Parks - Arrowtown “A great holiday park, very friendly and accommodating. Excellent facilities. Also a great big rugby pitch and heaps of room for kids” Sam Hampshire Holiday Parks - Arrowtown Book Now Frequently Asked Questions What are the reception hours? Our reception is open from 8am to 6pm every day. What time is check in/check out? Check in is at 2pm and check out is at 10am. What happens if I need to check in after-hours? If you know you will be arriving after hours, please let us know so we can let you know our late arrival procedure. What is your pet policy? We are a pet friendly park in the camping area only. Pets are not permitted during Peak periods, long weekends & special events – Please check with the park in advance to avoid disappointment on arrival. Pets are not permitted in any accommodation buildings or communal areas. Pets must be on a lead at all times and not left unaccompanied. Please ensure you clean up after your pet at all times. Is WiFi available? 1GB of complimentary WiFi is available on check-in. Additional data can be purchased from reception if required. Do you have laundry facilities? Yes, we have a laundry room with tap and go washing machine and dryers. Laundry powder is available for purchase at reception for $2.50 per sachet. What is in the kitchen? The kitchen is fully stocked with pots/pans, cutlery and crockery. There is also hobs, ovens, a microwave, fridge/freezers, kettles, toaster, tea towels and a drink vending machine. Is linen provided? Linen is provided in all our units and is available for hire in the lodge. This Rotorua motel is in the Fenton Street district, only 1.8 km from such natural sights as the public park "Government Gardens". The centre of Rotorua can be reached in 20 minutes' walk of the hotel, and such cultural venues as Whakarewarewa Maori Village Cultural Center are approximately a 10-minute ride away. Sports fans can also visit the Rotorua International Stadium, 2.4 km from the Brylin Motel Rotorua, and take their families to Motion Entertainment Rotorua, which is around 3 km away. There is Sulphur Point about a 30-minute walk away. The accommodation is within a few blocks of Old Taupo Rd - Fronting No 290 bus station. The Brylin Motel features 11 rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels as well as coffee and tea making facilities. They are outfitted with comfortable decor. Offering such amenities as hairdryers and towels, the bathrooms also include a roll-in shower, a separate toilet, and a sink. Guests can enjoy views of the city. Offering European meals, Atrium Restaurant is situated merely 400 metres from this hotel. FAQs See more FAQs How do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy? Yes, you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process, it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain. Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months. See details . How do I keep my personal information private? If you wish the domain ownership information to be private, add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public. To add privacy protection to your domain, do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year, and then for a small fee for subsequent years. Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update, and different registrars are faster than others. Guest who opted for home stay should have good etiquette and habit to make the stay a pleasant one for both the guest and owners. This is not a 5-Star hotel establishment. It is a 5-Star cozy home stay that will make you feel welcomed. Australia Vanessa 9,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House Good location and very clean! Very clean and the hosts were very accommodating. Lovely little touches like fruit, chocolate and loads of different types if tea. The breakfast was continental so there was muesli, yoghurt, dried apricots & nuts, fruit, cheese & biscuits, fresh juices etc. The location was perfect for the local restaurants and beaches. Parking was available down their drive, great for small/ mid range size but not for large cars however there is parking on the road up the drive. Just a little niggle but my husband found the bed too short and it was a little hard. Can't please everyone's tastes though. New Zealand Vicki 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House Fantastic. Would have loved to stay longer. Lovely hosts. Fantastic house and close to the village. All the extra touches breakfast ,chocolate,fruit etc were amazing. Would definitely recommend. Australia Mteurope 8,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House Very well appointed B&B Stayed two-nights in this very well appointed accommodation which was close to Howick shops and beach. Everything you need is supplied along with beautiful and comfortable furnishings and a very good breakfast. Hosts are friendly and professional, not too attentive nor too distant. Unfortunately, when we arrived we discovered a dog and two cats share the premises and there is no way to close off the upstairs area from the rest of the house. For someone anxious around animals as I am, this meant keeping the doors to the bedroom and loungeroom closed at all times which was inconvenient. It could be a bigger issue if you are allergic to animals. Not knowing about the dog and cats before arriving. They didn't end up being an issue when we were there but I would never choose to stay at a place where pets can access the guest area. Hong Kong Carl 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House Exceptional Great location and a small apartment style accommodation upstairs. United Kingdom Vicki 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House It was a home from home and Sharon and James were so so welcoming. I felt so relaxed at their apartment, it is just gorgeous and a great amount of space just to yourself, the location was fab with restaurants and shops nearby and the bed was just incredible!!! So nice with the touches of the food in the fridge, and cereal and tea bags etc. Was very sad to leave there if I am honest. Definitely go here if you want somewhere out of the way to relax after a long flight or a lot of travelling around. Perfect! Nothing! New Zealand Napier 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House The little extra touches were lovely. Very quiet and perfect location. The shower was excellent and the room very comfortable with a lovely breakfast. Nothing Argentina Gustavo 9,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House Nice beach nearby, quiet neighbourhood. Nice house! Nice owners! Little bit away from downtown, but 10 min away from ferry that links directly to City! New Zealand Katherine 9,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House Lots of extras like fruit bowl and cake added a nice touch No faults. Good local facilities and handy for half moon bay footferry into downtown Auckland. Took the stress out of driving/ parking in the city. Spain María 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House We just loved it, so clean and so spacious, with all the upper part of the house for us. They este lovely people and in just one days they had lots of details with us. Pity we were exhausted after a 35h tríp. We loved everything. New Zealand Anthony 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House I was looking for somewhere close to where I was attending a convention. James & Sharon's place had some good reviews so that helped me decide to book. The reviews didn't do their B&B justice! Everything a solo (or couple) traveler could want (or need) for a short stay was thought off. Having the entire 1st floor with an office, sitting room, bathroom and of course bedroom (with a very comfortable bed and pillows!) was absolutely first rate. Very nice touch of a welcoming card and some very tasty chocolate. I can't recommend Allendale House highly enough! New Zealand Cheryl 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House All of the hospitality details at the home of Sharon and James showed thoughtfulness and care, and it was much appreciated. Birdsong in the morning was a delight, as was the coffee. And plenty of room to enjoy it all. Australia Jade 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House It was was really well set up. We were given complementary chocolate which was delicious and a lovely gesture. Couldnt fault them. First time time stayimg at a BnB and i would definitely do it again. New Zealand Jain 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House We were warmly welcomed. Very clean, pretty and comfortable. Had the top floor to ourselves, with separate sitting room, very comfy double bed, and very clean and functional bathroom. There were several very nice personal touches, such as a welcome card and a bar of Donovan's chocolate. All in a very pretty location and within a short walk to shops, cafes etc. Superb value! Nothing United Kingdom Ventseslav 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Allendale House This was one of our best stays in New Zealand. James and Sharon are amazing hosts. We've got the whole second floor of the house for ourslevs. Living room, bedroom , bathroom and a study. The internet was very fast and they had Sky which kept us busy for a while :) The bed was super comfortable and eveyrthing was decorated in a cosy rustic way. We had a small handwriten postcard and a Manuca honey chocolate left for us when we checked in. It was super kind and we felt very welcomed and at home. Thank you James and Sharon! Local tourist attractions such as Clapham's Clocks, City Centre Whangarei and Tuatara Gallery are not far from the hotel. Also within easy reach is Abbey Caves. Facilities Discovery Settlers Hotel is a smoke-free property. Dining facilities at the hotel include a restaurant. Breakfast is available - a surcharge will apply. There is also room service available. Other hotel amenities include picnic area and tennis court(s). Leisure amenities: There is an outdoor swimming pool at the hotel. Other services: dry cleaning/laundry service, tours/ticket assistance and wedding services. Transportation/Parking facilities For guest convenience, parking is offered at no extra cost. Limo/Town car services can be arranged. The guests can check in from 14:00. Check-out time is 10:00. What is the nearest airport to Discovery Settlers Hotel? Whangarei, New Zealand (WRE) is located 4.1mi from the property. Does Discovery Settlers Hotel provide free wi-fi? We provide complimentary internet access in public areas. Does this property have a pool? Weather permitting, the outdoor pool is perfect to enjoy a moment of relaxation. Is smoking allowed on the premises? The establishment is entirely non-smoking. Is there a lounge or bar at Discovery Settlers Hotel? Guests may find a large selection of both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages at the in-house bar/lounge. Do hotels rooms have safes? For security and peace of mind, each room is furnished with a safe. Will room service be provided? Room service can be arranged for guests staying at the hotel. Is the front desk open 24 hours? Our helpful 24-hour front desk is ready to assist you with any inquiry. Are there restaurants nearby or on-site? Looking for a place to eat? The property offers at least one full-service restaurant. Are there laundry services? Laundry services may be available at an additional cost. How to book Discovery Settlers Hotel Making reservations for Discovery Settlers Hotel on this website is a secure and straightforward process. To check the nightly rates of Discovery Settlers Hotel, simply begin by selecting the desired dates/length of stay and click the "Check Rates" button. Comparison and decisions can then be made with the display of pricing information for each style of guest room. Information regarding room features and amenities is provided in the center of the screen. Having made the decision for dates, room style, and rates, simply locate and click on the "Book Now" button on the right hand side of the screen. After making this selection you will be transferred to a "Complete Your Booking" form where various information will be requested in order to reserve your room at Discovery Settlers Hotel. The "Details of Your Stay" will be displayed for your review so that you can ensure all information regarding your visit is acceptable and understood. After reviewing the details, proceed by filling in the information requested in the "Guest Details" section. Answer the few basic questions required. Please be sure to look over all supplied answers so that important details such as name and email address are spelled correctly. Upon completing this, simply select the "Complete Reservation" button to finish booking your room at Discovery Settlers Hotel. The use of a secure commerce server ensures that all personal data such as credit card information is secure and encoded into a non-usable form. Why Choose Locally Owned and Operated Multi-Global Award Winning Auckland Scenic Tours? Want to experience the best Auckland Day Tour or Day Trip from Auckland? With over 30 years business experience, let Auckland Scenic Tours show you on any of our 20 Auckland Day Trips the most important Auckland attractions and everything the City of Sails (Auckland) and beyond has to offer on one of our global multi-award-winning tours. Auckland Scenic Tours is the proud recipient of 8 Global Tourism Awards: - the 2025 Viator New Zealand and Australia Experience Award Winner - the 2024 Trip Advisor New Zealand and Australia Experience Award Winner - the 2024 Viator New Zealand and Australia Experience Award Winner - the 2023 Viator New Zealand and Australia Experience Award Winner - the 2022 Trip Advisor Winner of the New Zealand and Australia Experience Award - the 2019 Best Group Tour in the World - the Trip Advisor 2020 #1 Travel Experience in New Zealand www.aucklandscenictours.co.nz/awards/ - the Trip Advisor 2022 "Best of The Best" Award. We have tours to suit everyone, whether you are looking for a Hobbiton Movie Set Tour(fully guided tour with Hobbiton Movie Set Tickets); a Hobbiton & Waitomo Glowworm Caves Combo Tour (fully guided with Entrance Tickets); a Hobbiton/ Rotorua/ Te Puia, Kiwi House & Geothermal Valley Tour; a Coromandel Tour; a Bay of Islands tour; a Gully Guided Walking Tour of Downtown Auckland ; a Wine Tasting + Vineyard Lunch Tour; a Craft Beer Tasting Tour or an Auckland Tour (8 Hours); or an Auckland Day Tour (Half-Day/4 Hours) experience - our tours are the perfect way to see all the famous Auckland Attractions and the Attractions outside of Auckland. Learn about the key Auckland Attractions on our Guided Walking Tour of Auckland City. Immerse yourself in our history and visit the must-see attractions in Auckland with your friendly and highly knowledgeable guide - all within a timeframe to suit you. Our signature Auckland Day Tours and day Trips from Auckland offer a more personalized experience as we keep our tour groups small and as all our tour guides are local they can show you the places you won’t see in the guide books in the luxury and comfort of one of our yellow air-conditioned 12 or 15 seater Mercedes-Benz! What to expect from our Auckland Day Tours and Day Trips from Auckland We provide free pick up and drop off at all Downtown Auckland CBD accommodation and cruise ships. Sit back and relax while you marvel at the stunning attractions in Auckland on any of our 20 Auckland Scenic Day Tours or Day Trips from Auckland. Venture outside of Auckland on our Hobbiton Movie Set Tour , Hobbiton Movie Set and Waitomo Glowworm Caves Combo Tour, Coromandel, Bay of Islands or our Hobbiton Movie Set, Rotorua, Te Puia, Kiwi and Geothermal Tour; you will get an even better insight into our beautiful country. You will truly have a day to remember as your fun and friendly tour professional, affable and highly knowledgeable tour guide unfolds the breathtaking scenery and details our unique history. We provide plenty of opportunities to capture amazing photos that you will treasure for a lifetime! Tours BOOK NOW Want to see the best of Auckland? homepage_content: Destinations Motor Lodge | Your comfortable retreat BOOK NOW +64 6 374 8055 BOOK NOW BOOK NOW Experience Dannevirke in comfort & style. In the heart of Dannevirke. Come and explore the rural heartland town of Dannevirke while enjoying the quiet comfort of Destinations Motor Lodge. We're located close to the town centre and it's an easy walk to cafes, restaurants and shopping, parks and the Wai Splash heated swimming pool complex, churches and the bowling club. We're also the ideal place to explore the Southern Manawatu-Wanganui district. The motor lodge itself is an oasis of quiet relaxation and comfort, filled with country elegance and style. BOOK NOW Beautiful rooms. Whether you’re in Dannevirke for business, a weekend stop or a week of touring and exploration, Destinations Motor Lodge is the perfect spot to call home. Enjoy unmatched comfort from each one of our 12 spacious, fully-equipped, ground-floor rooms from well-appointed studios to one and two-bedroom units along with a spacious work area, plush beds and well-equipped bathrooms. homepage_content: EL DORADO QH STUD - Home [email protected] EL DORADO QH STUD Home "Gotta Lotta Gold" "Gotta Noble Legacy" Mares 2014 Foals 2013 Foals Mares due in the 2017 season For Sale Progeny of Gotta Lotta Gold Random photos of Buddy Contact Us The Importance of 5 panel testing At the EL Dorado QH stud our goal is to produce quality, super pretty, correct, good natured and affordable foals who are suitable for all disciplines. Our QH stallion "Gotta Lotta Gold" a.k.a Buddy is siring outstanding offspring that show enormous talent & trainability. Our up and coming QH stallion "Gotta Noble Legacy" is following in his sires footsteps and has his amazing temperament and great conformation. The 2016 season will be his first season at stud. name: gambonis.co.nz
homepage_content: Gamboni's Deli Welcome to Gamboni's! 12 Parkvale Road, Karori, Wellington (04) 476 5960 Mon - Fri: 7:00am - 6:00pm Sat - Sun: 9:00am - 3:00pm At Gamboni's Deli, we believe that a great meal starts with the finest ingredients. We bring together the best foods from around the world and right here in Wellington, ready for you to enjoy. As a family-owned business, we value personal connections and exceptional customer service. Our knowledgeable staff are always ready to assist you in finding the perfect ingredients. Whether you're a seasoned chef, an avid foodie, or simply someone who appreciates the finer things in life, Gamboni's Deli invites you to embark on a culinary journey like no other. Wellington fresh The best of local At Gamboni's, supporting local producers is not just a commitment, it's a celebration of the vibrant community we call home. We take great pride in connecting you with the finest local goods, ensuring that the products on our shelves tells a story of passion, craftsmanship, and the unique flavors of Wellington. A few of our local partnerships include: Brooklyn Creamery milk Emporio Coffee Schoc Chocolates International flavours Tastes of the world Delight in the robust flavors of European cuisine with our selection of premium cheeses, charcuterie, and gourmet pantry staples. From the creamy and velvety textures of French Brie to the intense and complex flavors of Spanish Chorizo, our European offerings capture the essence of centuries-old culinary traditions. Quick, easy, tasty Ready-made home cooking At Gamboni's we have a variety of mouthwatering dinners that you can take home, heat and eat. We make these fresh on the premises, so what's on offer is always changing. Check out our facebook page for the latest, or pop into the shop. Grab one with a fresh loaf of bread - what more could you need? Contact Have a question? Get in touch. Location 12 Parkvale Road, Karori Phone (04) 476 5960 Facebook Facebook Open hours Mon - Fri 7:00am til 6:00pm Sat, Sun 9:00am til 3:00pm Â© Gambonis Continental Deli Limited, 2023 site by easily

name: empirehotelross.com
homepage_content: The Historic Empire Hotel – Sharing Hotels – Sharing is caring! Skip to content No results CHECK PRICES The Historic Empire Hotel in Ross is a well-known West Coast landmark with a strong sense of local history and personality. Originally built in 1866, it was rebuilt in 1908 after a fire, with an exterior of wood and corrugated iron – fireproof and practical for the gold rush town. Today, it’s a lively pub that reflects over a century of Ross’s history. Location Situated on Aylmer Street just across from the Ross Historic Goldfields & Heritage Centre, the Empire Hotel is in the heart of the town’s historic core. It’s a gathering spot for locals and visitors alike. Dining & Bar The hotel offers full buffet lunches for groups and individuals, serving hearty and satisfying food. The bar opens at 12 p.m. and stays open until midnight. Most nights, you can enjoy a buffet dinner or fish and chips. On Fridays, the pub is famous for burger nights, and on Sundays, they serve a traditional roast with homemade desserts. It’s a place where good food and a relaxed atmosphere combine. The Atmosphere & History Inside, the walls are decorated with local history – banknotes hanging from the ceiling, old photos, hunting trophies, and lumps of coal tell the story of Ross’s gold rush past. The hotel feels unchanged over the years, with a cozy fire to warm up near during colder nights. Every Sunday, there’s live music in the garden bar, and on the last Friday of each month, visitors can bring an instrument for a jam session. Accommodation & Facilities The hotel has a range of options: in-house rooms with private ensuites, shared facility rooms, hostel-style backpacker accommodation, and camping sites with shared kitchens, showers, and laundry. This variety makes it suitable for travelers on different budgets or those wanting a simple overnight stay or longer-term option. What Makes It Special This pub is one of the last authentic “bawdy” establishments remaining in Ross – truly a survivor of the gold rush era. Its warm atmosphere, rich history, and lively community events make it more than just a place to eat and drink; it’s a piece of local heritage. Overall The Empire Hotel offers an authentic West Coast pub experience – good food, history, music, and a friendly, relaxed crowd. It’s ideal for those wanting to soak up local history while enjoying hearty meals and a lively atmosphere. Pros and Cons Pros: ✔ Historic building with a real gold rush atmosphere ✔ Wide range of accommodations: rooms, shared facilities, backpacker and camping sites ✔ Regular live music and community events ✔ Full buffet lunch and dinner, Sunday roasts, and Friday burger nights ✔ Friendly atmosphere with lots of character ✔ Close to Ross Goldfields & Heritage Centre Cons: ✘ Some rooms have shared facilities, which may not suit everyone ✘ Not a luxury hotel – basic and authentic experience ✘ Limited modern amenities and comfort features Overall, the Empire Hotel in Ross is a true West Coast experience – rich in history, friendly in spirit, and perfect for travelers wanting an authentic pub and lodge experience in a historic gold rush town. Owner helpful with how to get to places. The shared kitchen didn't have a microwave and the stove and oven had tape over the knobs signaling to not use it. The mattress on the bed felt like I was sleeping in a ditch. It was only after I showed the owner a video clip of the crawling insects did she ask me to find other accommodation. It was sad I had to pay 80 dollars for staying one night where I could not sleep. I also have taken a photo of the shower cubicle that appears to be layered with years of grime. There was no toiletries. Sad properties like this are allowed to function. Empire Apartments | Auckland | Selandia Baru 21 Whitaker Place, Grafton, 1010 Auckland, Selandia Baru ➤ Empire Apartments | Auckland Empire Apartments menawarkan akomodasi modern dengan harga terjangkau di Auckland CBD (Kawasan Pusat Bisnis). Empire dapat dicapai dalam 10 menit dengan berjalan kaki dari City Centre dan Queen Street. Anda dapat memesan studio yang luas, apartemen dengan 2 atau 3 kamar tidur, atau kamar pribadi yang terletak di dalam apartemen bersama dengan 2 atau 3 kamar tidur. Apartemen bersama memiliki ruang keluarga, dapur lengkap, dan 2 kamar mandi, yang digunakan bersama antara 2 atau 3 kamar tidur. Empire Apartments menawarkan meja depan, fasilitas binatu koin, dan kafe di lobi. Wi-Fi tersedia di seluruh area properti dengan biaya tambahan. Empire Apartments dapat dicapai dalam 10 menit dengan berjalan kaki dari The Auckland Universities dan dalam 20 menit dari Queen Street, yang menawarkan berbagai pilihan hiburan termasuk Aotea Square, Auckland Art Gallery, dan Sky Tower. Bandara Auckland dapat dicapai dalam 45 menit dengan berkendara dari Empire. United Kingdom Mathilde 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari East Coast Guesthouse Very comfortable and clean apartment with all the amenities you could wish for. Hosts couldn’t be more helpful and friendly. Breakfast was definitely a plus for us as well as all the advice on our itinerary. Would definitely recommend over a conventional hotel! Nothing! Australia Richard 9,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari East Coast Guesthouse The apartment was spacious and the Hosts, Peter and Charmaine were lovely. They set up the sofa bed for our young daughter and the bed in the main bedroom was very comfortable. We had queries re public transport and Peter organised a travel card for us - which was so unexpected and much appreciated. Breakfast food in the fridge was a nice touch. There wasn't much not to like. The location is probably a bit further out of the city than we expected - it was our first trip to NZ. However public transport was literally right at the front door and it was lovely taking the ferry home at night. New Zealand Claire 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari East Coast Guesthouse The entire place was great and Peter was a great host! I must say the photos undersell what the place actually looks like, which was immaculate. I wasn’t entirely sure before coming whether or not the bathroom is private, which it is (in case anyone else is also unsure). The place was clean, tidy, had everything we needed (and more). There were nice touches that I didn’t expect such as Connect Four and yoghurt in the fridge. Would definitely recommend staying here There was a slight kerfuffle before we came over as there was an accidental double booking of the room which worried us initially, but Peter sorted it out and we were able to stay. You will not be able to find a better host / guesthouse anywhee! New Zealand Darren 9,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari East Coast Guesthouse the hosts were so helpful, the flat is a little home away from home. we had some vehicle dramas and peter sorted us out above and beyond what ive ever experienced and we travel alot United States of America Gail 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari East Coast Guesthouse Our hosts, Charmaine and Peter, could not have been friendlier or more accommodating. They gave us information about public transportation as well as suggestions for dining and touring. The apartment was large, with two sofas, television, and a kitchen that included a refrigerator and microwave, as well as a place to cook, if we so desired. Very comfortable! The only thing is location, if you want to be withing walking distance of Auckland sites. If one is driving, it is about 15 minutes into Auckland. The town of Milford is within walking distance (great selection of restaurants). The bus comes regularly to take one into the city of Auckland, so transport to and from the city is not really a problem. We enjoyed being in a smaller community. name: bolda.co.nz
homepage_content: Bolda Limited – Design | Build | Enjoy Visit, Relax, Unwind - in comfort Call now 021 236 8001 Book Here Let us know when you're thinking of coming. Choose your residence Penthouse 2 Ensuites Ground Floor with Views Chic Studio We love it, and we know you will too. Freshness We take great care to have everything fresh and ready just the way we all like it, with our linen supplied by Linen Master and each unit cleaned to a high standard. Ambience Every unit is air conditioned with temperature climate control for your comfort and has chic soft furnishings with everything you need for a memorable stay. Central You will be plesently surprised by how easily you can walk to the village and beaches. Paihia village is also renowned for its entertainment and live music holding many festivals throughout the year. See why people love us Pentouse With Two Ensuites Get together and unwind looking over the bay, close enough to walk and peaceful enough not to hear the village. This apartment is in high demand with families visiting and coming together from around the world. With two bedrooms and double beds. Check Pricing 10% discount for our regular clients If you travel to Paihia for work we can offer discounts to suit your particular budget. Book Long Stays 20% For 7 nights If you book for seven nights or more we will give you a 20% discount off the normal tariff . Extra Long Stays 40% For 1 month If you book for one month or more we will give you a 40% discount off the normal tariff. About us We enjoy the vibrancy of Paihia with so many things to do and see, the live music and jam sessions make it incredibly entertaining. We liked it so much that we we thought it would be good to have a place to come to and refresh every now and again. So began the pioneering of Paihia Central. You will find more than twenty different fruit trees a herb garden and soon a solar energy array as we polish the project and realize its full potential. Check Availability Have a nice trip! Contact

homepage_content: Kolachi Cafe & Eatery About Us Welcome to Kolachi Cafe and Eatery, a stylish gem in the heart of Napier, the vibrant Art Deco city. Recently renovated, our cafe seamlessly blends history and modernity, offering breakfast and lunch delights seven days a week. At Kolachi, we believe that breakfast and lunch are not just meals but opportunities to create cherished memories. From the moment you step through our doors, you'll be greeted with the tantalizing aromas of freshly brewed coffee and the promise of delicious dishes crafted with love and care. homepage_content: Coastal Chalets Suites - Whangaroa Accommodation Coastal Chalet Suites Whangaroa Coastal Chalet Suites are rural self-contained suites situated on one of New Zealand's most scenic drive loops from Whangaroa to Matauri Bay just North of the Bay of Islands. Convince Yourself Three Luxury Suites Each Luxury suite is self contained and has it's own deck or patio with rural views and spa. Convince Yourself Separate Guest House Suite Stand alone fully contained Suite with its own living quarters, deck and spa. Convince Yourself Main Chalet Suite with 3 Levels "The perfect Honeymoon Suite" Large decks, spa and lots of luxuries! Convince Yourself Chalet Suite with 2 Levels Private lower suite with handcrafted Kauri kitchen - beautiful garden setting, 2 levels - private deck with spa. Convince Yourself Spectacular Rural Getaway Self-Contained Suites Available for Rent Gold Card Special Get 10% off accommodation For Gold Card members. Get 10 % off off accommodation when you book your stay direct with Coastal Chalet Suites Whangaroa. Bookings are for the GoldCard holders ONLY Does not apply to Public Holiday Periods ** Note - you must contact us regarding this special before booking. Accommodation Coastal Chalet Suites are self-contained suites situated on one of New Zealand's Northland most scenic drive loops from Whangaroa to Matauri Bay just North of the Bay of Islands. See map | Book Now | Rates | Video Coastal Chalet Suites sits on 5 acres of secluded rural farmland with harbour views. Warm summer days, stunning sunsets, fishing, entertaining … getaway from it all and come make your memories. Read More Things To Do Coastal Chalets Suites Whangaroa being located in the Northland of New Zealand is close to many adventure activities and relaxing past times including but not limited to Hiking, Kayaking, fishing, diving, sand dune surfing to visiting farmers markets. The following is only a sample of what can be done in this region regardless of the season due to the mild Northland weather you are sure to find memorable activities. Read More Sights to See Located in the Winterless Northland of New Zealand. Coastal Chatel Suites Whangaroa is an ideal place to stay as it is within reach of many Historical and interesting places to visit and explore. From towns such as Whangaroa, Monganui, Russell and Pihia to Natural locations such as 90 mile Beach, Cape Reinga, Bay of Islands, Te Paki sand dunes and much more ..... Read More Coastal Chalet Suites 3 Luxury Suites 131+ Positive Reviews 261 Square Meters 20 Guests Features of the Chalet Suites Relaxing Getaway accommodation Rural getway Coastal Chalet Suites are located on a 5 acre rural property supporting grazing sheep. Away from noisy neighbours but with smashing landscape views. Shopping options Kerikeri only 30 minutes drive away has a major shopping precent, while Pihia, Monganui and other towns have selections of shops for browsing. Pleasant Climate Coastal Chalets is located in the Winterless Northland of New Zealand so experiences mild conditions year around. Cosy Get away With fans, electric heaters, Spa pools and outside seating in all chalets - you will always be cosy regardless of the weather conditions. Self Catering in all Suites All Suites have fully equipped Kitchens for self catering, or if arranged in advance a chef can be booked for special occasions. Resturant and cafe options are a short drive away. Family Friendly Zone The rural location and fully equipped chalets are ideal for family or group getaways. Coastal Chalet Suites makes an ideal Northland base for Business events, Diving or Fishing outtings. From Our Guests Kirstie "This was a stay to enjoy a much needed rest over the Easter Break from hard physical work and also to complete a 6 month course which included a virtual retreat via zoom for a large portion of 2 days of our stay. It was absolutely perfect for both. It was quiet. The internet wifi was faultless. The spa pool was incredible, best I've ever been in. It was secluded. There were other guests in the house during our stay but it did not impede on our space or seclusion at all. Management was exceptional. Loved the experience. It made such an impression I still think about it often and will definitely go again." - Homeaway NZ April 2022 Sonja, Marianne + Susanne (Australia/Germany) We had the most wonderful time. This place is just amazing......just everything about it. The only negative is that we are not staying for longer. There is a high likelihood that we'll be back! Sue Burchell Excellent facilities, really clean. Very good communication with hosts. Good location for exploring the area by car. (Suite C - From NZ Holiday Homes review.) Cdfrenay Words don't describe the welcoming arrival to Coastal Cottages. Soft lighting, music, and a warm greeting. We've been overseas for 2 months, and this last stay is the highlight of our travels. We really did save the best for last. (Suite C - From Tripadvisor review.) Mara + Axel (Auckland) We had a great time, we enjoyed the beautiful view, the warm welcome and this beautiful house. We were lucky to have spent New Year here with all our friends. Thank you for your hospitality. (Suite C - From our Guest Book.) Richard R (Washington) Quiet, clean, spacious. An expansive view of the valley with just a bit of the harbor in the distance. Very helpful and friendly hosts. Add in a hot tub and a well equipped kitchen and we could easily spend a week here as we enjoyed the north island.. (From TripAdvisor.) Lovey (NZ) The large spaces indoor and out catered perfectly for our whanau. Stunning views from the main deck especially sunset. The spa was a hit for everyone and was utilised well. The lounge pull out sofa beds, indoor fire, easy access to wifi and huge tv provided the best home theatre for the kids during the evenings. Loved our stay and highly recommend the Coastal Chalet Suites... (From Facebook.) Sarah (NZ) Coastal Chalet's Suite C was an absolutely perfect getaway for a couple! We had a lovely time in the peace and quiet with the spa...bliss! Wendy was so kind as to leave me a lovely local soap as a birthday gift! How lucky we were to be able to stay at such a great place, I 100% recommend it to anyone, you will have an amazing time!! Tai (NZ) Best decision we made was to get out of Auckland (for a weekend) and stay here. AirBNB - August 2021. Helyar (NZ) Amaaazing setting, beautifully clean, well-kitted, comfortable, helpful manager. Would stay again. Holiday Homes - August 2021. Ant + Laura (Australia) "Thank you for your lovely hospitality. We loved staying here, although not long enough. We will always think of this as a very special place as it is where we got engaged! Couldn't have asked for a more beautiful setting and we will most definitely be back for a longer stay." Christine Had the best stay in Suite C chalet. The accommodation was spotless with a touch of luxury, the spa was hot and views amazing. Thanks you for a lovely stay we will be back again next year. The guest room opens out onto a sub-tropical courtyard to relax in peace or sit on the deck overlooking the park. Guests are welcome to use either of the 2 lounges. The exclusive guest wing includes a large, modern tiled bathroom with bath and shower. There is an adjacent children's bedroom with two single beds and a travel cot is available for babies. These are available for an additional cost. Free WiFi and private parking is available on-site. Breakfast is also provided. Located across the road is a park and children's' playground. Other nearby activities include the cinemas, sailing, swimming, kayaking, water sports, tennis, bowls, cricket, and football. The Spark Events Center, and Kelly Tarltons are a short bus-ride away, and Ellerslie Racecourse and Events Center are just a 3.1 mi drive away. name: gothenburg.co.nz
homepage_content: Gothenburg Restaurant – Exquisite Tapas Dining in Hamilton, NZ Skip to content We offer a delicious tapas dining experience in Hamilton – perfect for casual meals, special occasions, and afternoon drinks right next to the Waikato River. book a table Tapas Our tapas are plates designed to share, order a selection of them for the table and enjoy the variety. The bigger your group, the more flavours you will be able to sample. Food is best enjoyed freshly made, so our dishes are brought to your table as they are being prepared, some are fast and some take a little longer. Don’t miss out on our delicious desserts and cheese selection. If you are feeling adventurous, try a chef’s selection! Your server will be happy to help. see menu Venue Gothenburg is located on the lower floor of the ANZ Centre on 17 Grantham Street. Our stunning dining room has an airy feel with floor to ceiling windows and an amazing view of the Waikato River banks. Our outdoor terrace is a calm spot in the centre of the city where you can enjoy tapas or a drink on a sunny day. Gothenburg is just as suited for casual meals as special occasions, after work drinks or a coffee on the terrace, so come and enjoy our beautiful location by the river. Functions Location Our restaurant is situated right in the middle of central Hamilton, but tucked away in a very quiet spot by the river. We are a popular destination for riders on the Te Awa River Trail and a nice stop on the way for visitors to the Hamilton Gardens. We are located right next to the Hamilton Museum and soon not far from the new Waikato Regional Theatre which is due to open in 2025. We are very proud to take part in what Hamilton offers to locals and visitors to the Waikato region. book a table Gift Vouchers What better way to celebrate someone’s birthday or achievement than with a bit of luxury? Our giftcards can be purchased from the restaurant or conveniently purchased online. Electronic giftcards can be emailed to you or the intended recipient, or we can post out a physical gift card within New Zealand. Buy Now stay in the know Be the first to know when we release new dishes, have special announcements and events. Name Name Email NEWSLETTER SIGN UP

Shop For Cookies Our Story It all began when I was 8 years old... I wrote on my Bucket List that I wanted to own my own Cookie Shop one day. A collaborative community that is all about growing people, growing innovation and growing enterprise. 240Ha Greenfields Development Just 3km from Kaikohe, Northland Award Winning Project Status Flexible lease & purchase options Our Vision A Centre for Innovative Business & Processes ​ ​ Focusing on kaitiaki, employment opportunities, circular economies and regional capability development. We believe in mahi tahi, working together and in partnership with mana whenua, we aspire to create a more prosperous community. ​ The four pou that the park is aspiring to are ​ High Value Manufacturing & Production Innovation and R&D Workforce Development & Support Circular Economy Our Vision Our Park Partners - Who's here Park Partners Northland Inc at Mahinga Innovation Centre LEARN MORE Natural Product Business Cluster LEARN MORE Te Pūkenga / Northtec Regent Training Centre T&G Kaikohe Berryfruit Partnership LEARN MORE Agricultural Crops The latest news Ngāti Rangi ki Ngawha and Far North Holdings Sign Relationship Agreement for Ngawha Innovation & Enterprise Park Far North Holdings Limited is proud to announce the signing of a Relationship Agreement with Ngāti Rangi ki Ngawha acknowledging mana whenua and the shared commitment to work together for the ongoing success of Ngawha Innovation & Enterprise Park. The historic signing took place last week here at Ngawha Innovation & Enterprise Park, marking a significant milestone in a kaupapa that has been five years in the making. The Agreement formalises an enduring partnership that recog 44 minutes ago Kaikohe Berries and T&G Fresh Partnership Strengthens Horticulture at Ngāwhā A new partnership between Kaikohe Berries and T&G Fresh will expand berry production at the Ngāwhā Innovation & Enterprise Park ,... Sep 23 From Our Hub in Northland: Holistic Hound’s Grooming Bar Shines on the Global Stage We’re buzzing with pride at Ngawha Innovation & Enterprise Park today, as Holistic Hound - a shining example of Northland ingenuity -... Coupled with unrivaled innovation and business support services, this strategic opportunity calls to organizations and businesses seeking to add value and embrace a regenerative and circular economy ethos. ​ Curious about the opportunities at Ngawha Innovation & Enterprise Park? ​ Discover how to become a Park Partner and be part of this exciting journey towards a brighter future. CONTACT US DOWNLOAD PROSPECTUS Explore the Park Explore the park Explore the latest news, project time-lapse, master plan, sites and completed developments in our interactive gallery. If you would like to organize a guided tour for your organization please contact us ​ About Us Go to link Go to link Go to link Go to link Go to link Go to link 1/1 About Us Ngawha Innovation & Enterprise Park has been developed and is managed by Far North Holdings Ltd, working in collaboration with mana whenua Ngāti Rangi, Northland Inc and the local business community. Pivotal support is provided by Anchor Partners such as the regional economic development agency for Northland - Northland Inc, FoodBowl and The Employers & Manufacturers Association. ​ Enquiries are currently being welcomed from other organisations and businesses that are interested in lease or purchase opportunities within the park. name: northland.bni.co.nz
homepage_content: Business Networking Referral Organisation Groups | Northland | BNI NZ, New Zealand | English (NZ) Getting Started Easy Find a Chapter Submit a Request Complete the Registration Find a chapter Register Now Get Invited Get Invited Get Invited Get Invited Get Invited Get Invited Get Invited BNI Northland's goal is to help member businesses grow and make more money. Business Network International (BNI) Northland's chapters include companies, from start-up entrepreneurs to multi-nationals, who are committed to growing through business networking. BNI is the world's largest business networking and referral organisation and its culture, which is built on the philosophy of Givers Gain®, is unique. This is a culture of caring about giving business, professional development and building consistent, proactive, reciprocal and profitable business relationships. BNI helps its members develop a structured, positive, and professional referral marketing program which provides them opportunities to: Gain new business and increase revenue . Receive business education . Improve business networking skills with positive business people . Speak about business before an audience of positive, like-minded business people. Develop business relationships and create a group of trusted advisors. Network and communicate with members throughout the world using our exclusive, online networking system BNI Connect . Click here for more information about joining a BNI chapter. The best way to find out about BNI is to visit a chapter . You may also click here to find out “what to expect” at your first meeting. BNI Northland is actively building new business referral and networking groups. Click here to find out more about joining a new BNI chapter . This cozy accommodations offers continental breakfast, free Wi-Fi access and free off-site parking. The heated guest rooms open onto a patio with views of the garden. The private bathroom features a corner spa bath and separate shower. The property has a guest lounge with a large flat-screen TV. The host can help arrange local activities like sky diving, whale watching tours and trips to Canterbury Museum. The continental breakfast includes toast, cereal, yogurt, fresh fruit and tea/coffee. Dinner features seasonal delicacies and is available only upon request. Olive House B&B is a 15-minute drive from Hagley Park and a 20-minute drive from New Brighton Beach. It is a 7-minute drive from Northlands Mall and a 30-minute drive from Lyttelton. Peggie's Cottage | New Zealand - Auckland 3 Battenburg Place, 0630 Auckland, New Zealand (Lihat peta) ➤ Peggie's Cottage | Auckland Guests staying at Peggie's Cottage have access to a shared kitchenette, bathroom and a lounge area, on the ground level of a modern house. The owners live upstairs. Free WiFi is available. Peggie's Cottage is located in Auckland, 15 km from Auckland Harbour Bridge and 16 km from Viaduct Harbour. Both Sky Tower and SKYCITY Auckland Convention Centre are 17 km away. Auckland Airport is 35 km from the guest house. There are 2 bedrooms available to book. You will share a bathroom, which is equipped with free toiletries, and a hairdryer. The small, shared kitchenette has a microwave, stove top, electric kettle, toaster and a refrigerator. Learn more Don’t take our word for it … “I thoroughly recommend…” "I have used Mark McDonagh as my go to car supplier for nearly two decades, from when he was doing his own thing through to his role in Pukekohe Toyota. Mark has always been straight up and honest in every aspect, hence why I trust him. I thoroughly recommend Mark and the team at Pukekohe Toyota to anyone in the market for a new vehicle.” Craig Lipscombe “…Pukekohe Toyota would be the first place I would call” “If I ever buy another car Pukekohe Toyota would be the first place I would call on. Friendly, honest and patient are a few descriptive words I can use to describe my experience with them. Thank you, Pukekohe Toyota!” Noel Lumsden “… I am so grateful I chose Pukekohe Toyota” “I truly have never received such amazing service from any company as I did from Pukekohe Toyota, and particularly Glenn Begbie. When you’re a woman buying a car, you can feel very vulnerable, and I can say that I was treated with the utmost respect. I was searching for a Signature Class Toyota Corolla. 5-star safety rating, economical, and inexpensive to maintain. I was looking for the unicorn! From my initial email right through to the delivery, Glenn went above and beyond. He dropped my chosen car to the alarm guy as arranged, and then he delivered my car to me. Every promise made was kept. The best part.... Glenn's awesome sense of humour, he is such a hoot! I am so grateful I chose Pukekohe Toyota!” Felicity Buche Hybrid Happy "It goes for almost 1000 kms" Walter was in the market for a new vehicle that would cut his total petrol costs and achieve better mileage. “We saw the RAV4 was available in Hybrid and went straight for it. It not only allowed us to save money but also reduce our emissions on the environment”. Walter and his partner are such fans of the Hybrid RAV4, that they both had to get one. “We’re really happy with it. It’s very quiet, looks really cool and the fuel consumption is great - it goes for almost 1000 kms.” Walter Quan "...best purchase … ever" Jay bought a Toyota Hybrid for one key reason; he wanted a vehicle that would provide him with excellent fuel consumption in both urban and highway driving. The standout choice was the Prius Prime which has the added capability of plug-in charging. “The versatility of a Hybrid is great. I can make full use of the EV mode for my daily commutes and if I need to go long distances, I also have the reassurance of its smooth and efficient petrol engine. The amount of tech packed into the Prius was what ultimately won his heart, especially the impressive JBL sound system. name: rollinghillscountrystay.com
homepage_content: ROLLING HILLS COUNTRY STAY B&B - Home ROLLING HILLS COUNTRY STAY B&B Home Things to do Reviews Book About Us Contact Us Luxury in the country - Star Gazing - Forest walks - Farm fresh eggs The Space Romantic country get-away, on the doorstep of the beautiful Otanewainuku Forest, in Oropi, Tauranga. A place to unwind and relax in a lovely spacious, studio apartment with queen size bed, en-suite bathroom with shower and breakfast bar stocked with a selection of teas and coffee. Sit on the deck and take in the peacefulness while listening to the bird calls. Wander through the veggie garden and see whats growing or visit our friendly cows and give them a pat. ​ What's​ for breakfast A selection of seasonal fruit, homemade toasted muesli with yoghurt, bacon and farm fresh eggs done any style. Enjoy the taste of our rain water, with its double filtration and UV filter system - guests have said it is the best water they have ever tasted. Interaction with guests We are home most days and will be here to welcome you when you arrive. Having traveled most of NZ we can offer advice on where to go and what to see. We love meeting new people and having great conversations, but will also respect your privacy if you just want to chill. Where w e are We are s ituated on the doorstep of the beautiful Otanewainuku Forest with three stunning bush walks to enjoy, just 20 min from Tauranga and 45 min from Rotorua. Guest Access You are welcome to walk around our 5.5 acres of lifestyle block. At the moment we have 5 calves grazing on the land. An orchard of fruit trees which you are welcome to help yourself to, a huge veggie garden and free range chickens. Address 599 Mountain Rd Oropi ​Tauranga Contact Us Mobile: 64 (0) 21 229 4505 Powered by Create your own unique website with customizable templates.
