Featuring a sun terrace, this bed and Breakfast is set near attractions such as Christ Church Cathedral, Nelson. The bed and Breakfast is 2.7 km from Tahunanui Beach and 4.2 km from World of Wearable Art & Classic Cars Museum. The room is located on the highest point of the split-level home and has stunning views. It offers a desk, a flat-screen TV, seating area and a private bathroom, which is located a few steps down the corridor. Free WiFi is available to all guests. A continental breakfast is served each morning at the bed and Breakfast and includes fresh European home-made bread. The bed and Breakfast is walking distance to the Nelson waterfront. The nearest airport is Nelson Airport, 5 km from Queens Sea View B&B. homepage_content: Stay Central The Loft - Hotel in New Plymouth Stay Central The Loft 🌎 16 Devon Street West, 4310 New Plymouth, New Zealand Book a room Arrival Departure Adults 1 2 3 4 5 6 Children 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 Check Availability Set 3 km from Ngamotu Beach, 2 km from Yarrow Stadium and 80 metres from Puke Ariki, Stay Central The Loft offers accommodation situated in New Plymouth. The property is around 1.5 km from TSB Stadium, 1.8 km from Brooklands Zoo and 3.6 km from Port Taranaki. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Fitzroy Beach is 1.6 km away. The spacious apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Se ofrece un servicio de traslado al aeropuerto nacional de New Plymouth, situado a 20 minutos en coche. El mostrador de información turística ofrece información sobre las actividades y lugares de interés locales, como el Puke Ariki, la galería de arte y el impresionante paseo costero. El establecimiento sirve un desayuno buffet completo y dispone de cocina y té/café todos los días, las 24 horas. Hay restaurantes y cafeterías a 10 minutos en coche. Los huéspedes podrán explorar los jardines y contemplar las vacas que hay detrás del establecimiento. El desayuno incluye huevos ecológicos y gallinas de corral. En el establecimiento viven gatos amistosos. Todas las habitaciones cuentan con TV de pantalla plana vía satélite, escritorio y calefacción. Todas las habitaciones tienen vistas al jardín y/o al océano. Las habitaciones no comparten una pared. homepage_content: Sushi Plus Asian Street Fare | Napier South | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Sushi Plus Asian Street Fare PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Sushi Plus Asian Street Fare Order Online from Sushi Plus Asian Street Fare Japanese Cuisine * 4 Joll Rd Napier South, Napier 4110 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Katsu Chicken Rice Bowl Deep-fried chicken served with steamed rice, Japanese pickles, salad, mayo and sauces $17.70 Teriyaki Chicken Rice Bowl Teriyaki chicken served with steamed rice, Japanese pickles, salad, mayo and sauces $17.70 TOP SELLERS Katsu Chicken Rice Bowl Deep-fried chicken served with steamed rice, Japanese pickles, salad, mayo and sauces $17.70 Teriyaki Chicken Rice Bowl Teriyaki chicken served with steamed rice, Japanese pickles, salad, mayo and sauces $17.70 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 10am to 4pm Friday Closed 10am to 4pm Saturday Closed 10am to 3pm Sunday Closed Closed Monday Closed 10am to 4pm Tuesday Closed 10am to 4pm Wednesday Closed 10am to 4pm REVIEWS If you are looking for a restaurant. This is not one. It is more like a sushi shop and you just eat on the tables they provided. We tried to order the braised pork and the korean bulgogi beef donburi but they "ran out" by 12.30pm which is kinda weird. Anyway, despite what happened, the spicy pork and teriyaki chicken donburi was actually pretty good. Good price and good taste. Wilson Shum While the flavours aren't gonna bust your socks off like at a restaurant twice the price, I really enjoy this place, good selection of hot rice and meat dishes I enjoyed, nice service and just very charming and comfy, great friendly staff. Used to go here very often on my lunchbreak before moving away. Would def recommend Lachlan Hickey Walked past and had quite the craving for sushi so decided to pop in for a look, didn’t except for my taste buds to have the best time of their life from eating here. The salmon is so fresh and buttery & for the first time I’ve ever seen, they had a cream cheese and salmon roll with no avocado ready and waiting for me. The service was outstanding & there is unlimited soy sauce so you don’t run out. 11/10 the best sushi I’ve ever eaten and I have consumed plenty of sushi in my days, will forever come back if I’m ever visiting havelock north again Danielle Chambers Meal was delicious, Gentleman that served me was polite informative & engaging. Good service. Meal came out efficiently & hot. Yum thank you I'll definitely go back. Decor alil dark & dated. Good location. name: tasty-canteen.tuckerfox.co.nz
homepage_content: Tasty Canteen | Henderson | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Tasty Canteen PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Tasty Canteen Order Online from Tasty Canteen Chinese Takeaway * 254 Lincoln Rd Henderson, Auckland 0610 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Chicken Nugget $1.10 Chicken Nibble $1.30 TOP SELLERS Chicken Nugget $1.10 Chicken Nibble $1.30 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Friday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Saturday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Sunday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Monday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Tuesday Closed Closed Wednesday Closed 11:30am to 10pm REVIEWS First time I tried this place. Was very clean and Very delicious food. Would definitely be going there again. Chicken fried rice was delicious with a lot of chicken chunks. Fried chicken nibbles was fresh and batter was very crunchy. Pork bun tasted as good as the one I had previously at Stanley roast Kelston. Cost was reasonable will definitely be going back when in town. Neetah Ordered wonton noodle soup via uber eats. Comes with about 7 or 8 large pork wontons with good flavour and well cooked (firm cooked meat texture vs jelly meat mushy like some others. Broth isn't anything amazing but is fine and veges were fresh. Wairaka Mason The food here is good! I don’t know why but I’ve always avoided this place… The honey chicken w/ fried rice will have you hooked. Nasi goreng is alright too, but not spicy enough lol. Give them a go. M TL Really clean kitchen and it is run by husband (chef) and wife. I tried their 9th dish on the menu : 3 in 1 Mixed Chicken Fried Rice, Combination Chow Mein (Pork & Beef), Egg Foo Young . Perfectly cooked juicy and taste with good quantity of crunchy vegetables (carrot, onion, broccoli, cauliflower). The chef cooks simultaneously 3 dishes on 3 woks and he is an artist with precision the way he adds spice to food. The best part is food wasn't oily, taste, good quantity, generous amount of meat and even after eating more than half of the meal doesn't feel too heavy on the stomach as it is not oily. Great customer service. Will return back to try rest of the menu. Brian D'souza Quick service ~ 10min wait Delicious food that tastes fresh There is a reasonable amount of parking right outsider the takeaways. Wes Welch PREV NEXT LOCATION × Average Customer Rating 4 First time I tried this place. Was very clean and Very delicious food. Would definitely be going there again. Stream View | New Zealand - Christchurch 37 Warden Street, 8013 Christchurch, New Zealand (See map) ➤ Stream View | Christchurch You're eligible for a Genius discount at Stream View! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Stream View features river views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Christchurch, 3.8 km from Christchurch Art Gallery. 4.2 km from Canterbury Museum and 4.7 km from Hagley Park, the property features free bikes and a garden. The apartment has private entrance. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen has an oven, a microwave and a toaster. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels. Christchurch Railway Station is 7.2 km from the apartment, while Orana Wildlife Park is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Christchurch International Airport, 12 km from Stream View. Kind regards Monique 100% real reviews of Stream View Check the opinions of our clients Czech Republic Müllerová 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Exceptional Everything was great, nothing to complain about Nothing New Zealand Carol 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Suited our needs perfectly, private and good value for money. Perfect for a 2 might stay near the home we had just sold, whilst waiting for settlement. Handy location and great value for money. Very noisy roadworks in the area. Not something the host could control though. Australia Diana 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Exceptional lovely owners and very helpful, New Zealand Lisa 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Top Marks. Great place. This place deserves the full 10. Great hosts. Very welcoming. Everything you need and nice added little touches. Loved this place so much we didn't want to leave. Thanks for making our stay an enjoyable one and a great start to our trip to the south island. United Kingdom Andrew 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Brilliant place to stay when you step off the plane and want to get your bearings in South Island It is in a great location, easy access by bus to the city. Close to the shops and supermarket. Hosts very kind and friendly New Zealand Fletcher 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Comfortable amazing Christchurch airBnB House was lovely, super clean and hosts were awesome plus internet was lightning. We stayed on lower level, and once there was someone above us it’s very very loud. New Zealand Preston 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Nice stay, very friendly and welcoming hosts. Very nice and quiet neighborhood. Handy to the city. Eateries within walking distance. New Zealand Chrissy 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Wonderful It had what we needed, and nice and cozy. Close to our event which was only 10 minutes away. Probably u can hear their footsteps' noise from upstairs New Zealand Hanna 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Exceptional Everything great host Nothing Australia James 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Wonderful Hosts were very friendly. Great facilities inside the room (kitchenette was great). Neat little stay by the creek. Was very awesome seeing ducks waddling around next to the accommodation. Highly recommend this stay. New Zealand Mavis 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Mavis South Africa Monique and Tony were very accommodating and friendly. Malaysia Hedy 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Exceptional it is nice and quiet, and they have everything you need in a room! New Zealand Miriam 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Peaceful retreat spot.. Wonderful location. Quiet and private. Nice managers. Good facilities and comfy bed. Excellent shower which was a winner. Will stay again. Australia Melino 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Fantastic Good All good New Zealand Demi 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View We enjoyed our stay. Ducks coming to visit was a highlight. The soft bed was the only downside. Easy parking, friendly and obliging hosts (lent us a iron and ironing board), shower was amazing The bed was uncomfortable and we had to ask for an extra pillow. Also, we could hear the person upstairs walking around. Kitchen needed a few more items eg tongs, scissors, extra cup and glass. United Kingdom Deborah 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Exceptional Evening we could have wanted was there, it was well thought out and very clean. Handy for the bus route into town and short walk to the supermarket. Loved being able to self cater. Liked it all, maybe a net curtain to make it more private. Also, it was really noisy when the garage door was opened early in the morning!! Probably nothing they can do about that though. Austria K 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Exceptional We had such a great stay at Monique and tony's little appartment, it's super clean and big..you really have all you need. There is also a little oven where you can cook things on, spices and milk available We would definitely come back again if we have the chance! Thank you so much for this nice stay Nothing Australia Jolles 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Thanks to Monique and Tony for your contribution to us having a great stay in Christchurch. Great ambience in an excellent location with wonderful hosts who were unobtrusive but who were willing and able to help when approached. I would highly recommend this accommodation to anyone seeking somewhere to stay in Christchurch. The only small criticism is there was no wardrobe / cupboard to unpack clothes in to. Everything else was fantastic and we enjoyed our stay in Christchurch knowing we had somewhere nice and comfortable to 'go home' to each day. New Zealand William 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View An agreeable stay. It was a short walk to 3 bus-stops, with choice of 5 routes . It was great combining bus travel with (the hosts) bicycle . A peaceful residential neighbourhood. Functional kitchenette. Perhaps lack of a small table. New Zealand Suzanne 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Stream View Exceptional Great, quiet, private, safe place for a woman on her own. Everything you need in the kitchen and bathroom plus bedding options. Sea view guest house | New Zealand - Auckland 17 Heath Avenue Northcote, 0627 Auckland, New Zealand (See map) ➤ Sea view guest house | Auckland Enjoy the spectacular sea views from your room, next to the pool and outdoor hot spa pool. Located 10 minutes' drive from Auckland CBD (Central Business District) and 1.6 miles from Auckland Harbour Bridge, Sea view guest house boasts day or night views of the city, Sky Tower and harbour. In your room there is a flat-screen TV and a private en suite with a shower and free toiletries. There is also a desk in your room with unlimited WiFi. 2 roll-away beds and a travel cot are available on request. Continental breakfast is available every morning at the property, which you may like to enjoy on the large outdoor table, next to the pool. Sea view guest house has a garden area with playground with a trampoline, swings and a slide. Beaches, restaurants, a supermarket and a shopping mall are all a 5-10 minute drive away. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask the friendly host. Sky Tower is 2.5 miles from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Auckland Airport, 14 miles from the property. From 06:00 to 10:00 Guests are asking... hi what are the breakfast options please? Hi, re the free breakfast, it's cereal, toast, tea/coffee. Lovely to enjoy pool side enoying the sea views :) Hi, is the swimming pool heated and do you have parking available? Hi there, Yes we heat the pool in the summer (not in the winter) and the spa pool is hot all year round and yes we have free parking available Hi i would like to book both rooms so that it is private for us for the next avaliable weekend please. When is the next aval weeknd? (Fri-Sun) 12th and 13th August :) Hi there, Just want to clarify.. This is for 3 rooms and if i was to book 1 room then someone else can still book the other 2 rooms on th same date? Hi, We have 2 different areas for rent. 1 x 1 bedroom studio next to the pool 1 x 2 bedroom area upstairs If guests are both staying at the same time the only thing you share is the outdoor pool & spa. do you have to be vaccinated to stay here? no definitely no need for vax pass Oh yes forgot to say. 23rd to 24th August Sorry for the slow reply, yes available 23rd to 24th August 2021 Hi there, would I be able to book the whole property for check in on the 23rd and check out on 24th? If so, how much would that be? Or is only the 1 room available? Hi there, Not sure which month you are referring to. But if you mean June, we have our 2 rooms available. 1 room next to the pool and the other 2 x connecting rooms upstairs. You won't be on the property alone, as I live on the property too. Hi are the pools heated enough to use in October?! Thanks Hi there, yes they are Hello, we are a family of 4. Kids are 9 and 1. We are wondering if the spa pool is going to he available on the 28/9/2019. It is our anniversary and we would like to stay somewhere with the kids. Thank you Yes it is very kid friendly My kids and I love the look of your property and was wondering what would be in walking distance as we won't have a vehicle eg. restaurants, beach,etc Hi, yes you can walk to the local shopping centre (about a 20 minute walk). You can catch an Uber Taxi which is a 5-10 min drive to Takapuna which has an amazing beach, tons of restaurants and shops and a shopping mall if it's raining is this pet friendly? thx:) Hi there, sorry it's not suitable for pets. Hi there - can you give price for two adults and two children age 8 and 11 please . Approx $180-$200 (depending on the season), thanks Are you still taking bookings in Level 3 Covid for the weekend of 19 - 21 November for 2 nights? My daughters and I had Paihia booked but we are not allowed to cross the borders but we all live in Auckland. Hi, yes we are open :) Hi there, Happy New Year 😁 just wondering if theres other guests from the 12-14th January? And if the bathroom and kitchen is shared or does all rooms have there own private 1s. Thanks yes, it's available in January 2022. The only thing shared is the pool and the spa. Hi, If I would like to book for 8 persons. Then, can I book the entire property without sharing it with anyone. I want to book for 5/12 (check-in) & 6/12 (check-out). How many rooms will be there? what will be the charges? Thanks Hi there, We only have 1 room available on the 5th Nov - the other 2 rooms are booked out. It can fit 4 people and is next to the pool $180 per night. Warm regards, Melissa If we bring bbq, is that allowed? Yes you can bring a BBQ Hello, we are visiting for the night, picking up my vintage car out of storage… so we have a car/ plus car trailer, is there OSP at property? Thks. Hi, we can sort off street parking if necessary :) Is the pool heated in Oct and if so, to what temperature? If Auckland is level 2.5 or 3, would pool access be possible? yes, the spa pool is always hot. Re the big pool it flutuates Just wondering if i book on feb 8 and 5 people will be staying overnight and we have 6 more friends coming over but not staying overnight would it be possible? Hi there. we have 1 room that sleeps 4 people and two connecting rooms that sleep 7 people. Only paying guests are allowed on the property sorry. thanks Hi is the free breakfast for all guest? Hi, yes in your room you get free cereal, toast, tea/coffee. :) 100% real reviews of Sea view guest house Check the opinions of our clients New Zealand Harriet 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Sea view guest house Very Good Lovely view of sky tower & auckland harbour views - Outdoor facilities were the highlight of our visit .. Friendly & warm host who went out of her way to make us feel welcomed! Loved it Such a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Kitchen facilities unavailable, room only - great for a couple as we entered as a family of four .. New Zealand Dawson 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Sea view guest house TOP STOP &STAY I really liked the special welcome from Melissa. Lovely lady. The view stunning. Would stay again & recommend to others. Privacy was respected.. A bit fussy.. cleanliness is a top priority.. ... For me not everyone.. United States of America Jonathan 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Sea view guest house Wonderful space, stay & host. Would recommend to anyone! There's so many things that we loved about this place. Melissa was communicative and welcoming. She wrote the sweetest little signs to welcome us. We loved the quaint room that was truly perfect for our tiny family. It had everything we needed and the location was ideal. Melissa is a one of a kind host and we would stay again! The ONLY reason we didn't give this place a 10 has absolutely NOTHING to do with the stay or with the host. We traveled with a two year old- and if you know anything about two year olds, they have their own agenda. Our little lamb struggled with the time change traveling from the States and was whiney during the nighttime hours. On the second night of our stay another family had checked in to the other space. We had returned home from a long day out and our son was crying- it wasn't too awfully late, but later in the night. Needless to say, the other family wasn't a fan of our son's crying and made it very apparent by stomping on the ground above us. SO while the space is private but shared with others, I will say that you can hear most things going on throughout the entire house. It never bothered us, and I totally understand no one wants to hear a crying baby- I mean we don't either and we are his parents LOL Italy Paula 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Sea view guest house Wonderful The room, while not new, had an oceanic decor that made it feel fresh and cosy. Breakfast was simple and satisfying. The pool and jacuzzi were both breathtaking, and the beds were exceptionally comfortable. My children had a wonderful time during our stay. Melissa, our host, was absolutely fantastic and made sure that we were comfortable throughout our visit. New Zealand Gordon 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Sea view guest house Adequate overnight stop. Very cosy and clean. The location is good which in good weather provides a lovely view of the harbour. Swimming pool very handily located. The bathroom vintilation fan nwwds fixing. Some cutails or heavier net drapes would provide adequate privacy. New Zealand Churcher 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Sea view guest house Very Good The view, pool and spa are great, awesome spot to toast sunset.. Things are a little tired in places, but nothing major and good spot New Zealand Jennifer 7,0 Good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Sea view guest house Good Able to have breakfast. Good parking spot It would have been good to have a decent chair to sit on and the step up to the door was difficult. To big a step Finland Vilma 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about Sea view guest house Very Good A small room fir 4 but perfect for one night's sleep before a flight out. There was breakky easily, great on an early morning. Pool was great, staff was lovely A bit small for a longer stay, some things maybe a bit watn out... some beds a bit too soft for us but others might like them. Seaviews Accommodation | New Zealand - Nelson 65 Tresillian Ave, Marybank, 7010 Nelson, New Zealand (Lihat peta) ➤ Seaviews Accommodation | Nelson Situated in Nelson, 7 km from Trafalgar Park and 8 km from Christ Church Cathedral, Nelson, Seaviews Accommodation features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, free bikes and a garden. With garden views, this accommodation offers a patio. The bed and breakfast features a flat-screen TV. Guests wishing to travel light can make use of towels and linens for an additional supplement. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. A terrace is available on site and cycling can be enjoyed within close proximity of Seaviews Accommodation. The nearest airport is Nelson Airport, 16 km from the accommodation. Supermarket and takeaway nearby. Very generous continental breakfast brought to the room by friendly hosts (not so much staff as friends of the owners we think). Nothing United Kingdom Tim 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation Excellent place to stay We were greeted on arrival and given a tour of the property and facilities available. The room was spacious with ample facilities and a changing room and fantastic bathroom. The breakfast we received was top notch and served to our room. We were left to be ourselves but this did not feel wrong, we were really happy here. Fantastic views of the beach/bay from our room as well Nothing, this was an excellent place to stay Australia LeahAMC 9,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation This property was great! This property was great! It is a clean and stylish room, lots of space and a huge bed. In the room there was a mini fridge, air con unit, wardrobe, TV, both bed side tables, outdoor sitting area, tea coffee and hot chocolate, big bathroom with good shower pressure. Also had great curtains, easy to slide and blocks out the sun. The owners are great, happy to chat with you about the area and gives advice. Parking right next to your door off the street easy access. Free wifi with unlimited use. It was a small drive out of Nelson city center. Netherlands J 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation Beautiful and comfortable! Luxurious room and bathroom everything fresh, modern and clean. Refrigerator nicely in seperate closet and very quiet anyway. Very nice view and outside seating area (partly covered) We just stayed there for a night but a longer stay would definitely be recommended! Nothing worth mentioning! New Zealand Gina 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation This place is very cozy, the host were very kind and... This place is very cozy, the host were very kind and reliable. Family environment, clean and tidy, very Fancy facilities and stunning view. Good information about things to do around the area even outside of Nelson. I will come back 100% Everything was very good. United States of America Sung 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation Comfortable bed, good shower facility, convenient private... Comfortable bed, good shower facility, convenient private entry, nice view of the ocean. Quiet location. Only about 5 minutes drive to town. Owners are lovely people with the cutest dog ever. Saw a few shooting stars during my stay. I would've liked a microwave at least, but I do understand the owners' wishes to keep the place tidy. Australia Lynette 9,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation Excellent hosts and excellent views Rick & Stacie we’re excellent hosts. Nothing was too much trouble. We loved the accommodation and would thoroughly recommend it. The views were absolutely beautiful! Loved the breakfast also Nothing New Zealand Pepita 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation A get away in paradise. We got to borrow the family's bikes and helmets which was awesome. They had plenty of recommendation on what to do and info about the area. They were also happy for us to use their deck overlooking the sea to enjoy breakfast in the sun. New Zealand Greta 7,0 Bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation Enjoyable Nice clean room and very friendly hostess. Excellent storage and bathroom facilities. Quiet neighbourhood. poor TV reception. Room susceptible to noise rest of the house. Australia Louise 10,0 Bagus sekali Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation Relaxing stay in a beautifully decorated, warm room with a lovely view of the bay. This room was the ground floor of a house. The view was wonderful. There is a beach in the town, Tahunanui Beach, very nice to walk along. Half the beach is a dog beach, entertaining to watch all the dogs have fun. Have to drive to it, 16 min, 11km. Most of the route is 50kmh limit. The room was beautiful, so clean and lovely colours. Big ensuite and walk in robe. Outside there is a outdoor furniture in the garden. The hosts were very friendly and helpful. We arrived at 2pm-ish tired from a lot of travelling so we popped round the corner to the 4 Square supermarket and got sandwiches, chocolate bars and a bottle of wine and just stayed in the room admiring the view. Continental breakfast is available at an extra cost. Everything was wonderful Neuseeland Gitta 9,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation „Entspannt und ruhig mit Blick aufs Meer Das Haus ist neu und sehr modern, wie auch die Einrichtung. Alles super sauber und bequem. Die Vermieter freundlich. Im Zimmer ist ein Schreibtisch, aber keine Sitzecke, die hat man auf der überdachten Terrasse. Den unteren Garten hat man für sich. Die Aussicht ist super, sogar vom Bett aus, dank der großen Fenstertüren. Begehbarer Schrank, großes Bad mit großer Duschkabine und u.a. Regendusche. Es ist sehr ruhig, aber mit dem Auto ist man in 5 Minuten im Zentrum oder man leiht sich bei den Vermietern ein Fahrrad, dann ist es eine schöne Tour. Man sollte einplanen zum Essen auszugehen oder kalt zu Essen - großer Kühlschrank jedoch keine Mikrowelle wie man es von anderen Unterkünften in Neuseeland kennt. Ich hätte mich in dem Zimmer mit heller Einrichtung und Teppichboden aber ohnehin nicht zu kochen getraut. Deutschland Claudia 9,0 Sangat bagus Tujuan perjalanan: Perjalanan rekreasi Apa yang akan Anda soroti dari Seaviews Accommodation „sehr schöner Strandblick, ruhige Lage, sehr sauber! sehr schöner Strandblick, ruhige Lage, sehr sauber! Internet/Wlan war nicht so gut. name: suncourtindian.co.nz
homepage_content: Suncourt Indian - Taupo's best indian food Welcome to Food Inspired by the streets of India Time honoured traditional recipes VIEW OUR MENU discover OUR STORY Millions of street food vendors make up the colour, sounds and smells of India. They nourish the appetites of busy office workers, sweaty rickshaw wallahs and hungry school children throughout the day. Our menu pays homage to these road side culinary geniuses. Our food is the simple earthy, lovingly prepared food of the people and represents the tastes of India today. We respect your decisions and we cook all our vegetarian meals separately. Halal meat available on request. Read more about us here serving more than food COMMITMENT TO THE COMMUNITY Nourishing Our Community Beyond the Plate Savoring the Spirit of Giving Trending Tastes Our Viral Video Success When Taste Meets Trend Our Viral Journeys We are more than just delicious Indian food At Suncourt Indian, our commitment goes beyond just the flavours we bring to your table. We believe in nourishing not just the body but also the spirit of our community. Our dedication to supporting local events and initiatives is a core value that drives everything we do. Whether sponsoring local sports teams, participating in charity fundraisers, or providing meals to those in need, we are committed to making a positive impact. As a vital part of the community, we see it as our mission to give back in meaningful ways, ensuring that our success is shared with the people who make our neighbourhood thrive. Our commitment to the community is unwavering, and we will continue to support and uplift it in every way we can. Supporting Volunteer Organisations in Taupo At our Suncourt Indian, we believe in the power of community and the importance of giving back. That’s why we’re dedicated to supporting volunteer organizations in Taupo, offering our resources and services to help those who make a difference. Whether providing meals for volunteers during events or contributing to local initiatives, we are committed to helping those who selflessly serve our community. Together, we can create a stronger, more connected Taupo. It’s our collective support that makes our town a better place to live, and we’re all part of this journey. See us on Facebook Committed to Your Dietary Needs At Suncourt Indian, we respect your dietary preferences. We offer a variety of options, including keto, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, and halal dishes, to ensure you can enjoy a delicious meal that aligns with your lifestyle. Whether you’re looking for health-conscious choices or specific dietary accommodations, our menu is designed with you in mind. Let us provide you with the flavours you love, tailored to meet your unique needs. Order Now Celebrating Five Years in Taupo and Many More to Come As we approach our 6th birthday in Taupo, we’re filled with gratitude for the support and love from this amazing community. Our journey has been incredible, and we are committed to staying here and continuing to serve the delicious food you love. We look forward to many more years of being a part of Taupo’s vibrant community, supporting local initiatives, and sharing memorable moments with you all. Thank you for making us a part of your lives—we’re here to stay! Order Now Our Commitment to Making You Smile At Suncourt Indian Taupo, we always strive to respect and put a smile on our customers’ faces. From the moment you walk in or place an order, our goal is to provide you with delicious food and a warm and welcoming experience. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we’re dedicated to going the extra mile to ensure you leave with a smile. Thank you for choosing us—we’re here to make every meal memorable! Order Now Celebrating Together: Your Joy Is Our Joy When you celebrate, we celebrate right along with you. Whether it’s a special occasion or just a meal to brighten your day, we’re here to make every moment memorable. At Suncourt Indian, we take pride in being a part of your celebrations, big or small. Your happiness is our happiness, and we’re honoured to share in the joy of your special moments. Here’s to many more shared celebrations! Order Now our AMAZING CHEFS Suncourt Indian has southern/northern Indian food consisting of flavourful spices, deep rich curries, lentils, and variations of a tandoor. Offering a different range of spice levels, subtle to pungent; mild to hot Indian food that caters to both vegetarians and non-vegetarians. homepage_content: The Monarch | Restaurant, Bar & Cafe | Pukekohe Home Welcome to The Monarch – Pukekohe’s Local Favourite Restaurant for 27 Years At The Monarch, we believe that dining out is about more than just delicious food and great drinks — it’s about creating lasting memories with the people you love. For over 27 years, we’ve been proud to be part of those moments, delivering experiences that feel special every time. From leisurely weekend brunches and casual weekday lunches to a seasonal dinner menu that’s always evolving, every dish we serve is made with passion and care. Whether you’re joining us for sun-soaked cocktails, a business lunch, a family gathering, or a romantic dinner for two, we’re here to make your visit unforgettable. Whatever the occasion, The Monarch is your place to relax, connect, and enjoy. “Food brings people together on many different levels. name: nelsonbnb.co.nz
homepage_content: Ty Byrn Bed and Breakfast Richmond, Tasman Skip to content Ty Byrn Bed and Breakfast Richmond, Tasman Call 021 797 006 Welcome to Ty Bryn Book Now Welcome to Ty Bryn Nelson Bed and Breakfast Don’t worry if you can’t say our name, one of us can’t either! Ty Bryn is Welsh for “Hill House” which we felt was a great name for our new home and cosy bed and breakfast. Read More Tripadvisor 5.0 23 Reviews Relax in our warm moden home Relax in Our Home Enjoy Your Stay With Us We have been hosting travelers since 2015 and enjoy meeting new people while hearing stories of their background and travels. We are located just off the Appleby Highway – the main route to the World Famous Abel Tasman National Park . A pleasant walk to the nearby Playhouse Cafe, a short drive to the vibrant village of Mapua as well as a conveniently close to several boutique wineries . Explore all that the Tasman region has to offer – including the oldest pub in New Zealand in the nearby historical village of Upper Moutere . Or take a day to enjoy the sun at one of the best beaches in the World – Kaiteriteri Beach, just a short thirty minute drive away. name: thedrifter.com
homepage_content: Christchurch City Accommodation | Drifter Drifter Christchurch Book Now About Our Accommodation Welcome to Drifter Christchurch, an experience for the free-spirited where our story is yours. Christchurch accommodation just got interesting. We may not have met yet, but we can’t wait to do so and smile and laugh and sing and talk about different stories and write new ones in the snow and sun, and above all, have some fun. Drifter brings together hotel comfort and hostel energy in one design-led space, offering the best of both styles under one roof. There’s a suite for every kind of stay, from solo escapes to group getaways. Communal spaces are as functional as they are easy on the eye, and everything from the kitchen to the cinema is set up to help you feel at ease. Come for a night, or stay a while. Lets drift away together, somewhere, forever. VIEW ON MAP BOOK NOW Stay Curious in Christchurch Step into our house, our home, a unique hotel hostel right in the heart of the city, Drifter Christchurch, where you can rest or stay restless and drift between days and dreams, and nights and lights and lose yourself somewhere in the seams. ROOM TYPES Premium Suite Loft Room Private Suite Superior Shared Suite Female-Only Shared Suite Looking for Christchurch accommodation that feels more like a good decision than a default option? Drifter Christchurch is made for curious travellers, not just guests. You’ll find private suites, shared spaces, and the freedom to tune in or drop out. Come solo or bring the crew, there’s room for both. Travelling solo? Check out our Christchurch hostel setup. Prefer a little privacy? Our Christchurch hotel style suites have you covered. FACILITIES LETS GO ENQUIRE HERE WHAT’S ON CHRISTCHURCH THINGS TO DO MOUNT HUTT HAVEN TATTOO GONDOLA RIDE OPUKE THERMAL SPA ADVENTURE PARK STARGAZING PORT HILLS BOTANIC GARDENS MOUNT HUTT HAVEN TATTOO GONDOLA RIDE OPUKE THERMAL SPA ADVENTURE PARK STARGAZING PORT HILLS BOTANIC GARDENS BRINGING THE WHOLE CREW? Planning a trip with a group can be overwhelming, but worry not—we’ve got your back. At Drifter Christchurch, we’re set up for groups of all shapes and sizes. From school trips to sports clubs to your entire friendship circle, we’ve got the space, support and flexible setups to make it all easy. With Christchurch’s new Te Kaha stadium set to host major sporting events and concerts, Drifter makes the perfect home base for teams and fan groups. Just tell us what you need and we’ll sort the rest. You’ve got alpine peaks on one side, the Pacific on the other, and a creative pulse running through every laneway. Wander along the Avon River, catch a local street artist at work, then grab a bite at Riverside Market. Want views? The gondola’s got you covered. Christchurch stands out. It’s the kind of place that stays with you long after you’ve left. And soon, a new highlight joins the list — Te Kaha, Christchurch’s multi-use arena. Opening in 2026, this world-class stadium will host everything from international rugby to headline concerts, right in the heart of the city. Just minutes from Drifter, Te Kaha is set to be a landmark where sport, music, and culture collide. Must-sees in Christchurch: Christchurch Gondola: panoramic views of the city and Canterbury Plains Botanic Gardens: leafy paths, seasonal blooms and a place to pause Canterbury Museum: local history, Māori culture and natural exhibits Christchurch Tram: hop on and explore the city with a little old-school charm International Antarctic Centre: penguins, ice rooms and interactive exhibits Riverside Market: local eats, brews and market buzz Re:START Mall: colour, creativity and container-built stores Want more recs? Whether you’re here for a few weeks or a couple of months, it’s a flexible, friendly option for long-term accommodation in Christchurch NZ. Can I book as a group? Absolutely. Reserve Your Table Current Events From festive Christmas specials and Ladies’ Lunches to Happy Hour deals, there’s always something exciting happening at The Birdwood. Don’t miss out on these unique moments to savour with friends and family. See What's On Celebrations Looking for the perfect venue for your special event? Whether it’s a small gathering or a big celebration, The Birdwood has the space and flavours to make it unforgettable. Learn More Learn More About Us Our food Fresh, seasonal and delicious. Simple but delicious and yeah, we love a food trend but we stay in our lane Our community Easy going, people focused and authentic. Sustainability We only have one planet, so we try to do what we can to think about our footprint. Our team Our people are the backbone of our food, our hospitality and we love and appreciate them. Their wellbeing is an imperative. About Us Where community, sustainability, and great food meet Testimonials What Our Fans Say “A legend of this area.” and we can confirm that what it does, it does well. Like buttery polenta? You'll get plenty. The eggs are well prepared and the dishes are all constructed with intellect. The coffee is really very good and the team is typically happy to see you. Kitchen Insider, 5 stars on google "Pizzas were amazing" Crispy and doughy and fresh. Chips were chunky and satisfying too. Service was impeccable. Frequently Asked Question about The Parque What is the average price to stay at The Parque? The average price is 122 usd for the next dates. To know more details, please enter your arrival and departure dates. Is there a wifi connection in The Parque? WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge. Is there free parking at The Parque? No parking available. What services are offered at Hotel The Parque? Daily housekeeping, Laundry Additional charge, 24-hour front desk Are pets allowed on The Parque? Pets are not allowed. What is the check-in time at The Parque? From 14:00 to 00:00 What is the check-out time at The Parque ? Until 10:00 Guests are asking... Do you have parking and if so is there a charge? Good evening, yes we do have free parking. However, it is first in first serve. Alternatively there is street parking for free also. Hi, In case of lockdown, do you give a full refund? Thank you, Regards, Marine If a lockdown was to happen again we would indeed give a full refund if you could not attend your booking because of COVID. Is there a free parking onsite available? There is limited free on site parking available - this comes on a first in first served basis. Alternatively there is free street parking as well. Is there just off street parking? Where does everyone park? we have limited parking spot at hotel it will be first come first serve basis however, Street parking is free all the time. Hello,could you please confirm that the room is serviced each day?many thanks and looking forward to our visit:) Hi Yes, room will be serviced every day by our lovely housekeepers. Is there late check-in available? Our flight arrives at midnight! Yes it is available. Our check in time is 2pm and so anytime after 2pm is fine. Thanks and Regards, The Parque Hi - are we able to leave bags with you a few hours before check in? Hi, Thank you for your question. At the Parque there are no staff onsite so if you would like to leave your luggage you could come down to its other hotel called Southwark Apartments just 5 min drive from the Parque. Best wishes, The Southwark Team Hi is there free parking at your facility? Hi, Thank you for your message. There is limited parking available onsite. Parking is a first come, first serve basis. There is free street parking available. What is the latest time I can cancel... just with so many COVID cases around You can cancel up until 2pm on the day of arrival. Hi there, we are trying to book for a large group on the dates 20th to the 22nd of January 2023. How many rooms are available on these dates? Hi, Thank you for your question. How many guests are you speaking of when you say large group? Most of out rooms at the Parque are available for those dates. We have king rooms and few queen rooms with only one bed. Thanks and regards, The Parque Hi there, rooms has a private bathroom? Also do you provide shuttle airport services? Thank you for your questions. All rooms have an en suite. We can recommend a shuttle service for you, however we don't provide this service. Hi do you have oxi pay or after pay.? Thank you for your question. We do not offer either oxi pay or after pay. Many thanks If we cannot stay due to Covid-19 travel restrictions (booked a room without free cancellation) does your cancellation policy cover these travellers? Yes it does. We are happy to refund any guest who cannot make there booking due to Covid-9 travel restrictions. Hi there, Do you have a car park ? Thanks, Cheers There is limited on site parking available alternatively there is street parking as well. Is there any bond needed? As I have been from a motel that wanted a $250 bond first and I never got told that earlier and it ha horrendous roof top parking Hi, Thank you for your message. No bond is required, however a valid credit card is required. We may pre authorize an amount. Thanks Alisa Does the room have a full oven or just a microwave and stovetop? All rooms have only microwave. Hi, is there any credit card surcharge on top of the advertised price? Hi, there will be 2.5% Surcharge. Hi, our flight will be arriving after midnight, just wondering is it possible that we do a late check in after midnight or a self check in? Thanks! Hi, you can check-in anytime on your arrival day from 2pm onwards as we are sending out the unique access codes prior to arrival. There is also a phone located in the foyer that you can use to reach a staff member for any assistance 24 hours a day. what options do you offer for breakfast ? Unfortunately we do not offer breakfast - as there is no restaurant on site however there are plenty of options for breakfast in the area. Hi there, we will have a hire car is there anywhere to park? There is onsite parking available. It is on a 'first come, first served' basis. There is free street parking available. 100% real reviews of The Parque Check the opinions of our clients New Zealand Maria 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque I’ve stayed a few times now and it’s good place. The room was lovely, the bathroom was good. The location is great. The walls are thin, there was a door constantly slamming somewhere. Australia Thomas 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque Wonderful Modern, clean, effective use of small space. Washer and dryer were easy to use and convenient. Australia Victoria 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque Wonderful Lovely hotel. Easy self check-in and check-out. Good location in walking distance to bus stops, park and eateries. Large room, comfortable bed. Noise from other guests entering main corridor New Zealand Pauline 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque Very Good Lots of stairs, should be stated on the website that there are stairs United Kingdom Alice 9,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque Wonderful Big room, super clean. Had a small kitchen with all necessities. Bathroom was very clean, shower was hot and very good pressure. Netflix included in the room as well Walls are quite thin, could hear the people in the room next door New Zealand Caroline 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque You won’t be disappointed! Excellent return visit. Spotlessly clean and so quiet! Brilliant location. New Zealand Corazon 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque Good value for money and would like to come back again Clean, handy to all amenities Noisy when someone is using the shower and footsteps you can hear. New Zealand Katherine 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque fantastic stay in lovely property Comfortable. Lovely room. Australia Brendan 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque Well positioned, modern, clean amenities, very secure. Parking a challenge for a large SUV Location within easy and scenic walk of gardens and city Room had no view so felt a bit boxed in United States of America Heena 8,0 Very good Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque Good location Located on a quiet street and close to restaurants and parks. It would be nice to have staff to ask questions or store luggage when needed. Australia Glenn 10,0 Excellent Purpose of trip: Leisure trip What would you highlight about The Parque What a great place to visit and a wonderful location to stay! name: amici.nz
homepage_content: Amici Italian cafe and restaurant | Order Taste of Itlay Online in Whangarei - Order Meal Dessert Menu "EntrÃ©es Crafted with Passion, Delight in Every Bite." Main Menu "From Classics to Innovations, Our Mains Shine Bright." Set Menu "From Classics to Innovations, Our Mains Shine Bright." Book A Table "Your Table, Your Experience â Reserve Today!" Contact Us "Contact Us: Your Questions, Our Answers." Amici Italian Cafe and Restaurant Nestled in the heart of Whangarei, down bustling Quality Street, Amici is a charming eatery serving an extensive Italian menu to cater for all throughout brunch, lunch, dinner, Pizzeria and dessert When does a restaurant become more than just a place to just get something to eat? When does eating out become a great experience? At Amiciâs, we strive to be YOUR favourite Local authentic Italian restaurant. Food is at the heart of our mission. From the Italian classics, to our one-of-a-kind spiced Italian favourites, all of our offerings are handcrafted from the finest, freshest ingredients available. Whether youâre craving Italian comfort food like our Ravioli, Pappardelle or something with a little more spice like our signature Fettuccine Carbonara, Amiciâs has something for everyone. We revere the tradition of serving only the best, and when it means coming in early to hand-roll the meatballs, build a layered Lasagna one layer at a time, or craft our tiramisu from scratch, we think of it as passion, not work. And while we are most proud of the Italian classics, itâs our one-of-a-kind, signature spicy dishes that really get us excited! A little something we call Spiced Italian. Our Pastas, Gourmet Pizzas, and pizza Garlic Bread have been some of our more popular dishes since we first opened our doors. So whether you love the classics, or the spice, it will always be fresh and handmade to order at Amici plus we have a range of desserts, nibble or simply a casual wine or coffee, â Amici will happily welcome you. With an expansive terrace, featuring a classic tranquil fountain, and a warm interior with a cozy fireplace, the restaurant is suitable rain or shine â all year round. We also cater for Gluten free, Vegan, Dairy free. View our full menu Order Takeaway Online Order Online Now Happy Customers Review Us Contact Phone: 09 438 2961 Address: shop 13/69/71 Cameron Street, WhangÄrei 0110, New Zealand Follow Us Opening Hours Monday - Sunday : 10:00 - 3:00pm, 5:00pm - 9:00pm Order Online Now

name: bakehousecafe.com
homepage_content: Bakehouse Cafe top of page BAKEHOUSE CAFE. a place for everyone Order Online Anchor 1 baked daily . made local . for you Gourmet Treats Artisan Breads Coffee See Products about Our Bakery At Bakehouse Cafe, we are a family owned business that prides ourselves in serving our local community with high quality baked goods. Since 2002, we have been recognized for our award-winning rustic sourdough breads, cakes, pies and pastries which are hand made from the finest ingredients. ​ Bakehouse Cafe is more than just a bakery. It's a community hub where locals gather to enjoy freshly baked goods and connect with one another. Come on in and experience the magic of Bakehouse Cafe for yourself. You won't be disppointed! Read More artisan Products Harnessing the skillset of the industries most renowned pasty chefs and utilising specialised equipment, Bakehouse Cafe produces award winning, unique and delicious creations that enlighten your taste buds. ​ Whether you need a filling quiche for dinner, a loaf of artisan sourdough for breakfast or award winning parfait for your weekend gathering, we have all your catering needs covered. Find Us customised Celebration Cakes Bakehouse Cafe ​celebrates gathering and celebrating life together. Whether it's a first birthday, anniversary or farewell, these delicious and artistic creations will be there to enjoy with your village. ​ Don't have a cake that sits in a fridge for days before you enjoy it. Celebrate with only the best - your people and our cakes. ​ View Gallery Jump start your day Coffee. bottom of page

The spicy pot is so so good! The spicy broth is 100%, just come and try it for yourself! Zeng Seng Kee This is an authentic Chinese restaurant. 🫶 We’ve tried the “choose your own ingredients” on the display fridge. And decided to make a soup called MALA TANG (MALA SOUP) in Medium Spicy flavor. So good! Highly recommended! Plus the golden buns is so good as well!! 🤗 Jenny Suarez The food was delicious! The clay pot rice was impressive. We hadn't had clay pot rice in a long time, and it was up to true local standards. The malatang was very tasty, with a wonderfully creamy soup. We'll definitely be coming back again. Leanna Wong This is my second time here... Last time, we had BBQ and congee. Both were yummy and of very good quality 👍😊. That's why we come back to try new dish again... This time, we tried 㷛仔飯 and stir-fried 自選鍋。Both are very good!! Coming back here the third time. BBQ and stir-fried are both very good quality. Asian hospitality Friendly staff Very tasty Malaysian Chinese food. Fish head noodle soup is amazingly made in here. Crispy prawns is also highly recommended. The venue is small, business is so good, customers are coming nonstop. name: castlepointhotel.co.nz
homepage_content: Castlepoint Menu Home Accommodation Gallery Book Now Fun Times Food Privacy Policy Contact Us Castlepoint Welcome to The Castlepoint Hotel or as the locals call it " The Whakataki ". Whakataki translated from Te Reo means Introduction. We are your "Introduction to the sea" Where history abounds and the natural wonders of Castlepoint will excite you. The welcome is warm, the beer is cold and the destination is as big as the journey. We are open - Tuesday - Thursday 3pm till late Friday to Sunday from 11am till late Stay a while in our relaxed comfortable accommodation and enjoy our good ol' Kiwi hospitality. Surf the breaks, dive for Paua & Crayfish, play a round of golf, try your hand at tennis, walk for miles along the beach, wander the hills, take a bike ride, surfcast off the beach, swim in the lagoon, visit our iconic lighthouse and bring your camera to capture those special memories of this special place. The surf is a short walk from the hotel and Castlepoint is 5km down the road or less along the beach. See you soon! Buffet $30 Saturday *Terms & Condition Apply Entree Mains Desserts Drinks Welcome to Chapati Indian Restaurant, Henderson Auckland – Dine in and Takeaway Traditionally the thing to serve with curries, is either Chapati (Roti) or Naan instead of bread and it would be true to say that most homes in India still make their daily batch of fresh Chapatis. Chapati is unleavened bread made of either white flour orunsifted meal with a little shortening, but instead of being baked they are toasted over a griddle till they are freckled gold. To see a freshly stacked pile of Chapatis is a sight that will tempt any age group, and many a child has snatched one whilst mother is not looking. Come right in ……and join us in an exciting culinary journey which is a result of centuries of patronage to the art of cooking and a large repertoire of delicious recipes. We proudly share with you all the flavours and subtle nuances of authentic Indian cuisine so you may nurture a fond intimacy with our cuisine. For your best dining experience, each dish is individually prepared to ensure freshness and quality. Food delivery and takeaway available for Glen Eden, Henderson, Henderson Valley, Massey, Ranui, Swanson, Te Atatu Peninsula, Te Atatu South, West Harbour and Westgate in Henderson Auckland. name: beejidhaba.co.nz
homepage_content: Beeji Dhaba Victoria Street | Dhaba On Highway Frankton | View Our Menu - Order Meal Welcome To Beeji Dhaba 587 Victoria Street, Hamilton Central, Hamilton 3204, New Zealand Order online call us 07 464 0146 Welcome To Dhaba On Highway 587 Victoria Street, Hamilton Central, Hamilton 3204, New Zealand Order online call us 07 974 0022 About Beeji Dhaba Beeji Dhaba at 587 Victoria Street, Hamilton Central, Hamilton, is a charming spot that brings the rich, heartwarming flavors of traditional Indian cuisine to New Zealand. Inspired by the age-old culinary traditions of North India, Beeji Dhaba offers a welcoming atmosphere where the essence of homemade Indian meals takes center stage. This cozy eatery is known for its mouthwatering dishes, from the sizzling tandoori platters to creamy curries, all crafted with fresh ingredients and a careful balance of spices. Whether you're in the mood for buttery naans, aromatic biryanis, or tangy street food favorites like chaat, Beeji Dhaba promises a memorable dining experience. Beeji Dhaba is perfect for casual meals, takeaways, and even small gatherings, where the warmth of Indian hospitality makes every visit special. Whether you're craving a quick snack or a hearty meal, this dhaba-style restaurant is a go-to destination for anyone seeking a taste of home-style Indian cooking in the heart of Hamilton. name: bountifulearth.nz
homepage_content: Bountiful Earth Swanson Homemade Burgers and Handmade Pies Online Ordering Ph Orders 09 833 3965 About us Owned by local Westies, we are passionate about creating quality food using the freshest ingredients, including free-range produce. Fresh pies are baked onsite daily, our cabinet is full of delicious baking and a huge range of sandwiches with plenty of gluten free and vegan options. Our burgers are really special with amazing homemade burger buns, hand-pressed 100% beef patties with a wide selection of vegetarian/vegan burgers on the menu too. The better we eat, the better we feel. Come and taste now! “What others have to say.” Hidden gem in Swanson. Fresh, Tasty and healthy food. You’ll get full off of 1 burger but it’s so good you’ll want 2. Great coffees, extra hot as requested. Best burgers EVER! So yummy. DECENT size. Best variety and quality of food you'll find this far west 🙂 Great service, so friendly with many vegan options. Lunches & Coffee Espresso Coffee using Millers Coffee Beans. Variety of sandwiches & sweets Free Range Bacon and Egg Baguettes Vegan & GF Options Available Pies Huge range of handmade pies Flaky golden pies made on site, to satisfy your hunger Freshest ingredients for great tasting pies Vegetarian options available Burgers & Nights Homemade Burger Buns Made Instore Free Range Eggs, Chicken & Bacon Tasty homemade vegan patties Phone and online orders welcome, Ubereats Our Cabinet Collection Great range of Sweets available daily in our Cabinet including our ever popular Rocky Road, Apple Strudel and Decadent Caramel Slice. homepage_content: Riccarton Accommodation Christchurch: Coachman Motel, New Zealand Home Accommodation Location Activities Reservation Contact Accommodation at Riccarton Road, Christchurch The Coachman Motel features 10 spacious ground-floor units, including 6 studio units (sleep 1-3 persons), 2 x 1-bedroom apartments (sleep 2-4 persons) and 2 x 2-bedroom apartments (sleep 2-6 persons). Each of our units and apartments are serviced daily and feature: Studio Unit (Sleep up to 3) Clean and tidy unit with full self-contained and serviced in large space. Reservation Enquire 1-Bedroom Unit (Sleep up to 4) Good size unit, one of the units has shower over bath. Reservation Enquire 2-Bedroom Unit (Sleep up to 6) Large unit, one of the units has shower over bath. Reservation Enquire 3-Bedroom Holiday Home - 18 Carbine Place, Sockburn (Sleeps 5) Carbine Holiday Home is a 3-bedroom holiday home with free WiFi throughout the property, set in Christchurch. The property boasts views of the garden. Free private parking is available on-site. A dishwasher and an oven can be found in the kitchen. A flat-screen TV, as well as a CD player are featured. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Christchurch International Airport, 5 km from Carbine Holiday Home. Reservation Enquire 3-Bedroom Holiday Home, 45 Fovant Street, Russely Fovant Holiday Home is a holiday home with a balcony, set in Christchurch. The property features views of the garden and Free WiFi is offered. There is a seating area, a dining area and a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher. A flat-screen TV is available. The holiday home offers free private parking on-site. Reservation Enquire Cancellation Policy Cancellation of bookings is required within 48 hours of scheduled arrival time. If the room is sold within 48 hours, no charge is applicable. Should that not occur then one night's tariff is payable. All cancellations need to be either in writing or by email. Motel Policies Please read our Motel Policies . Amenities and Affiliations Fully-equipped kitchen Microwave Shower bath (in 4 units) Phone Electric blankets Heating Linen Hairdryer Iron LCD TV and DVD player Wireless internet available Off-street parking Car wash area Guest laundry Coachman Motel 316A Riccarton Road, Christchurch 8004, New Zealand Phone: +64 3 348 6651, Email: [email protected] Copyright © Coachman Motel | Website designed and powered by AA Web Builders

name: elmwoodmotel.co.nz
homepage_content:
The Elmwood Motel Christchurch Nz | The Elmwood Motel Skip past navigation Welcome to
The Elmwood Motel A relaxing motel in the heart of Christchurch, NZ Welcome to The Elmwood Motel A relaxing motel in the heart of Christchurch, NZ Guests 1 guest 2 guests 3 guests 4 guests Book Now The Elmwood Motel Rating : 4.5 Stay in style at our freshly refurbished motel, offering spacious rooms near Christchurch CBD. With restaurants within walking distance, you'll have everything you need for a memorable stay. 1 Bedroom Apartment - Ground One-bedroom apartment on the ground level, featuring a super king-size bed and a separate bathroom with a walk-in shower or Shower over BathFor entertainment, a 50" smart TV is provided in the lounge.Accessible Room Available on request 1 Bedroom Apartment, Upper Level One-Bedroom Apartment, First Level, Super King-Size Bed, Separate Bathroom with Shower over Bath.A 50" Smart TV in the Lounge for your enjoyment. 2 Bedroom Apartment - Upper Level Two Bedroom Apartment, 1st Level, Super King Size Bed and 2 Single Beds, Separate Bathroom with Shower over Bath50" Smart TV in Lounge for your enjoyment. King Studio - Ground Floor King Studio on the Ground Level, Super King Size Bed + Single Bed, Separate Bathroom with Bath/Shower.43" Smart TV in Lounge for your enjoyment Executive 1 Bedroom Apartment - Upper Level One-Bedroom Executive Apartment, First Level, Super King-Size Bed, Separate Bathroom with Shower over bath.A 50" Smart TV in the Lounge for your enjoyment.Luxury Executive, Larger Room, Expresso Maker, Luxurious Bed, Various Extra Room Features. Executive 1 Bedroom Apartment - Ground Level One-Bedroom Executive Apartment, Ground Level, Super King-Size Bed, Separate Bathroom with Shower.A 50" Smart TV in the Lounge for your enjoyment.Luxury Executive, Larger Room, Expresso Maker, Luxurious Bed, Various Extra Room Features. Deluxe 1 Bedroom Twin Room - Ground Floor One-bedroom apartment on the ground level, featuring a super king-size bed in Bedroom and a Single Bed in the living area. A separate bathroom with a walk-in showerFor entertainment, a 50" smart TV is provided in the lounge. Comfort Apartment (Dog Friendly) - Ground Floor One-Bedroom Apartment - Ground Floor. Away from other unitsPet friendly but only on application for small Non-Shedding DogsThank you for choosing The Elmwood Motel for your time away from home with your pooch. We have tried to make it a pleasant and easy experience for yourselves and our other guests.There must be only one dog per unit unless prior arrangement with the manager.Your dog must not be left in the room or car unattended at anytime.All pets must be on a leash while outside of your room.Pets are not allowed on any furniture or guest bedding.You will need to supply all of your pets bedding and food (food and water bowls are available)If the manager is unhappy with your dogs behaviour eg excessive barking, aggression towards other quests or staff you will be asked to leave without a refund (or to the discretion of the manager)Surcharge applies per night, $30 per DogAn extra room cleaning fee of $30 will be charged for any booking including pets. There will be additional charges if your pet damages any property or the room is requiring significantly more cleaning.You must tidy and pick up after your pet.Dog Friendly Room is for small non-Shedding Dogs only.It is up to the discretion of Management at the time of Checkin to see if pets are eligible for this.When you check in, Youâll need to sign a Pet Policy Agreement, and then you and your pet can make yourselves at home.Be sure to keep your pets on a leash or in a carrier if theyâre outside your room.Please contact the office to make arrangements for room cleaning. Because we canât clean your room while you and your pets are present, we suggest you schedule a time during our normal cleaning schedule for us to clean while you are out and about. We may request a bond payment of $100 on check-in. This will be refunded once your room has been checked at departure If your room requires excessive cleaning, or if damages are incurred as a result of your petâs actions, the hotel will charge for additional services and repairs. Twin Room - 2 Singles - Ground Floor Twin Room, 2 x Single Beds, Semi Access Unit, Ground FloorOne-bedroom apartment on the ground level, featuring 2 x Single Beds in the Bedroom with a separate bathroom with a full walk-in showerFor entertainment, a 50" smart TV is provided in the lounge. One-Bedroom King Suite - Disability Access One Bedroom Access Apartment on Ground floorOne-bedroom Access Disability Apartment on the ground level, featuring a super king-size bed and a separate bathroom with a walk-in showerFor entertainment, a 50" smart TV is provided in the lounge. Recently Refurbished 23 Room Motel in walking distance to Christchurch CBD Beautiful Rooms Whether youâre in Christchurch for a weekend stop or a week of touring, The Elmwood Motel is the perfect spot to call home.Enjoy from each one of our 23 suits, along with a spacious work area, plush bed. Local restaurants within walking distance Summer Special 10% Off Telephone Number +64 3 355 0580 Address 91 Papanui Road Merivale Christchurch Canterbury 8014 New Zealand

name: thebaysbnb.co.nz
homepage_content: The Bays Bed & Breakfast | Auckland – The Bays BNB | Offering a sundeck and a terrace, as well as the views of the patio, The Bays Bed & Breakfast Auckland is located within 6 km of Auckland War Memorial Museum. Parking is available on site at this 5-star bed & breakfast Close Book now There is nothing to show here! Slider with alias home-1 not found. The Bays Bed & Breakfast Offering 6 individually styled rooms and multiple living areas, outdoor decks with sea views, balconies and private bathrooms. The Bays Bed & Breakfast Auckland is located within 10 minutes drive to the Auckland War Memorial Museum and the City. Walking distance to many beaches and The Barfoot Stadium. Parking is available on site at this 5-star bed & breakfast. See available rooms Cozy Seaside Retreat: Stylish Rooms with Garden or Sea Views, Fully Equipped Kitchenette, and Private Bathrooms The bed and breakfast provides guests with a terrace, garden views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and bathrobes. The units come with a kettle, while some rooms come with a balcony and others also have sea views. At the bed and breakfast, the units include bed linen and towels. People Trust Us A nice spot not far away from the city.Very clean and friendly. Near the bays by walk or 2 min drive. It was very clean and the host was very friendly Michael Solo traveller The host, Sharren, is amazing. She is super friendly and knowledgeable about the area. Her home is immaculate and so close to the sea. One could not ask for a nicer place to stay. It is 5-star quality. Within minutes, one can stroll along Auckland Bay. James Solo traveller Friendly service and great facilities The host was amazing and super nice The bed was super comfy Toby Couple Superb Spaciousness of the apartment and the bathroom was amazing. Robert Couple Perfect for a short or slightly longer stay, such a great base for exploring. So welcoming and homely. It was lovely to be greeted and shown around. Lauren Solo traveller Beautiful house in an excellent location. Clean and comfortable, perfect for a trip to Auckland. Deborah Couple Address: 94 Kohimarama Road Kohimarama, Auckland Phone: +64 21 839 849 Opening Hours Check-in: From From 14:00 to 22:00 Check-out: Flexible to 10:00 Guest Perks Free breakfast Free Parking Copyrights © 2025 The bays Bed & Breakfast. name: currytwist.nz
homepage_content: Curry Twist Skip to the content Close Menu 437 Queen Street, Masterton 5810 Ph: 06-370-3659 Order now To appreciate this rich and varied cuisine one must understand the philosophy that dictates Indian food. The strongest influence on Indian food is of Ayurveda an ancient body of knowledge on health and life. Curry Twist believes in authenticity, and serves amazing, delectable dishes that will give the true taste of that rich tradition. We want to express our message through food, by passionately cooking traditionally and nutritionally balanced Indian Cuisine. Our mission is to providing a quality service to our customers while serving you with traditionally cooked Indian food. Feast on some of our customers favourites like the Butter Chicken, Tandoori Chicken, Lamb Rogan Josh. Time preference Delivery time 11:00pm pickup Cancel Update

name: forbiddencity.co.nz
homepage_content: Forbidden City Restaurant | Lower Hutt | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Forbidden City Restaurant PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Forbidden City Restaurant Order Online from Forbidden City Restaurant Chinese * 44 Queens Dr Lower Hutt 5010 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS 30. Steamed Rice $3.00 8. Pan Fried Dumplings (6 Pcs) $12.00 TOP SELLERS 30. Steamed Rice $3.00 8. Pan Fried Dumplings (6 Pcs) $12.00 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup LUNCH DINNER Thursday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm Friday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm Saturday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm Sunday Closed 5pm to 9:30pm Monday Closed 5pm to 9:30pm Tuesday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm Wednesday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm REVIEWS A nice place in the lower hutt city to try out authentic Chinese food. Specially a halal menu. Can accommodate different group sizes. Would be a nice place to hang around with friends and family. Food was superb and delicious and I visited second time as well. Beijing roast duck was amazing and I tried it for the first time. Dumplings tasted well. We tried out many dishes there and did not regret of ordering and tasting for the first time. Definitely recommend and worth visiting many times to taste the food since they consistently maintain the same level of quality. Shafwana Shafeek This restaurant has giving me a great curiosity and challenged me to have a lunch here: 1. Why someone named a restaurant a FORBIDDEN CITY? It's very COOL like a movie title, but it's not. 2. It have a neon sign when open, even in the afternoon. It's weird but interesting for me! 3. the interior was not very inviting but at the same time very authentic?? 4. And then.. Serving an authentic chinese peking duck as a recommended menu?? 5. Some of the so-called Halal food wasn't leave a good impressions but okay I give it a try. I came with my wife on her birthday because she's craving peking duck from a long time, and we growing curiosity in this restaurant together. We ordered Roasted duck and Corn soup. The soup arrived first. My impressions is positive. The flavour was balanced. When you put some soy sauce and chilli oil, it hits different!! It was very perfect because we eating when outside is rainy so it warm our mouth, head and body. The roasted pecking duck became our "main course", along with the rice. We are very overwhelmed with the flavour. It's juicy, delicious, crispy skin... We could never want anything more than this!! The last bite still feel it's was first bite.. What an experience. When we finished and wanna pay, I never expected this: they selling the chilli oil!! Chilli oil here is very mandatory and never skip this on every meals here. Forbidden City is a proof that your restaurant doesn't have to be a gimmicky interior and striking sign to be a good restaurant. The name itself, the food, is enough reason to you why you should stop here and go home with the stuffed stomach. Very recommended. Abdul Razzaq I found the balance of flavour in all the dishes too much on the sweet side for me and the orange beef lacked a crispy batter. Helen Joe If you’re looking for an authentic halal Chinese restaurant with great food, large servings and quick service, this is the place to be. Bookings are recommended as they do get filled up some nights. I’ve been to many Chinese restaurants and this sits well on top of my list and the food is always consistent and service is quick no matter how busy they are. Eugene T Anyone who asks for the best Peking duck in Wellington, this is where you come! They have the best chef from Beijing and you get so much meat! You can choose "one way", 2 ways (Peking duck with noodle stir fry) or 3 ways (duck bone soup) basically just use the rest of the duck and not wasting them. We got the 3 ways and the soup is nice and refreshing, noodles we could live without but it's fine. Bonus is their cold dish mung bean noodles is the best I've ever had and love their stir fried eggplant with mince stuffing. name: collectivecoffee.co.nz
homepage_content: Collective Coffee | Coffee Shop Wellington top of page 26 Panama Street Wellington At Collective Coffee we celebrate the idea of ‘gathering’ and collaboration At Collective Coffee we celebrate the idea of ‘gathering’ and collaboration. We celebrate simplicity. A simple smile and hello and simple and delicious fare to nourish your body. We gather produce from our collaborators and create beautifully crafted food and drinks. We offer you a safe and relaxing environment to rest, ponder and gather your thoughts. ​ Our Menu Our regularly changing menu reflects the best ingredients of the season. Freshly made sandwiches, pastries, muffins and other sweet treats are perfect for a light lunch or a quick bite. We serve refreshing juices, matcha, and coffee. ​ Our Collaborators Sandwiches, muffins, scones, and cookies from our friends at Astoria Espresso & Wine Bar Pastries from Wellington Sourdough Matcha from Thea Tea from T-Leaf Juices from Most Juice Coffee (hot and cold) from Flight Coffee Our interior is designed by Allistar Cox, and our menu by Michael Pearson. Our identity is crafted by Creature. Our Location We’re located in Wellington CBD. We’re collaborating and sharing space with the WCC Public Library Te Whare Pukapuka o Te Awe on Brandon / Panama Streets. bottom of page
